reviewText:
These arrived in a cute little blue box that would be perfect for gift giving.  BUT there is no way I am giving these away.  They are so pretty and I have discovered a new love of rose gold.

I used to wear gold and then switched to silver.  I didn't even know that rose gold existed.  :)  I was given a necklace and then fell in love.  This is my second pair of earrings and I love the sparkly aspect to them.  They look very pretty in the sunlight.

I have received many compliments in the last week that I have been wearing them.  These are a definite keeper...but I think I may need to purchase another set for my mom whose birthday is coming up!

These dangle at a great length... I think they would look really good with either short hair OR long hair.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. I also want to put this out there that just because I may receive and item for free or at a discounted price, does not mean that I ill just give it a high rating and made up review. I always try any product or service I get before I give my review. It wouldn't be fair to the seller nor anyone else who is out there reading reviews to see if they want to purchase it or not.
summary: Beautiful earrings... love the rose gold with the sparkles!

reviewText:
These  earrings  are absolutely gorgeous.
I'm old and honestly I never paid attention to Rose Gold until about a year ago and when I did I fell madly in love with it.
When I saw these, and realized that I  actually do not own any rose gold earrings, I knew I had to get them.
 With having longer hair I can't just get your basic post earrings, nobody will ever see them. The length of these is perfect.
 They arrive to you in a super cute "Tiffany blue" box which every girl loves.  They are super shiny and pretty. I love the crystal accents in them.

 I am a person that has pretty sensitive ears with almost all earrings,  but with these, I have not noticed any itching or irritation which is a great thing since I love them.
They would definitely make a great gift but seeing that I don't own any Rose Gold earrings I'm definitely keeping these for me.
They arrived quickly and they're pretty and feminine and a great find. Super excited to add these to my jewelry collection.

* I was lucky enough to receive these at a discount in exchange for my Unbiased review

Full Disclosure: I have not contacted the company yet so I cannot comment on their customer service nor, if they give me a replacement, if this just happen to be a "lemon".

reviewText:
I like the selection of different colors. I love Blue so that is the bag I chose. The bag has enough space for my computer, some files and several other notebook type items. The strap is adjustable so that is great for me, as I am a shorter person. It is very durable and has quality canvas. The price may be a little high, but overall I liked the bag.

I received this product at a reduced amount for my honest and unbiased opinion.

I have been using this bag for a week or do now and all I gotta say is wow.  This bag is VERY sturdy.  Even the smaller areas are pretty decent.  The treading is neatly stitched as well. No loose ends! The main compartment is button up.  The smaller compartments is where you use the straps.

It's huge!  I got it to fit my 15 inch notebook, a text book, notebook and pencil case.  I still have room left.

I just received my messenger bag yesterday and I was very happy with the quality of the bag. I got the XL messenger bag in the Lake Green color and it is very nice shade of green. I wanted something a bit brighter than the traditional army green. I normally carry a large purse and thought this would be perfect to carry all my stuff. It is made from a thick canvas material and has many little pockets to store all my goodies. I like that the front pockets have snaps and the middle zipper keeps things secure, instead of just folding over the top. I don't have to worry that I will lose anything. The strap is thick and has a pad, so it does not dig into your shoulder when you carry it. The front buckles seem to be more for looks than function, as they are a bit magnetic, but don't seem to stick well. I don't mind because the snaps keep the front pockets secure and the buckles complete the look of the bag.
As you can see from my pictures, there is lots of storage space. You have front pockets, side pockets (which could easily fit a cell phone), a small inner pocket on the inside, and the main part of the bag, which as you can see is large enough to stash a whole bank bag. I really like this bag and would recommend it to others. It has so many uses and looks very stylish. I received mine at a discount for my fair and unbiased review, but I would buy another in a different color because I really like the size of this bag.
summary: Practical, stylish, and amazing storage capability

A similiar dress I ordered had the seam in the front of the dress rather than the back. As if they sewed the bottom part on backwards. I noticed my neighbor ordered this exact same dress and hers was just like it was pictured. Best described: I think some people at this company have been sewing for a while and can make the dress. And then those who are new, they don't know how to sew at all but have a manikin to look at so they attempt to make the dress by looking at it. It really is a hit or miss on whether you'll get something made correctly or not.

Tonight my HeShe bag arrived.  It was packaged well to insure it arrived in excellent condition.  This is the best investment I have ever made in a purse.  It is the perfect size to accomadate my belongings including my IPhone 7S in an otter box case!  Even fully packed there is room to spare!  The interior is made of a heavy weight lining, with a large spacious interior, and three pockets sewn to one side of the purse. It is the perfect depth, because when I open it I can see the bottom of the bag, and everything that's in it at a glance!!  On one side of the purse there three pockets sewn into the same spot.  Two with zippers and one an open pocket sandwiched between them.  I put 7-8 makeup items in one, my checkbook in another and several small misc. items in the open pocket.  BAM  organized!  on the other side of the purse there are two slender  pockets. I put my work ID badge and keys in one, and my sunglass clip in the other.  These don't "fall" open into the purse body, they "hug" the side they are sewn into.  All of the metal buckles and rings are heavy weight, including the zipper pull.  The zipper moves easily. I am a shorter person so the two attached handles work as a shoulder bag for me, but I will keep the longer strap on this purse, as I like to have the option of using it as a cross-body bag when carrying it a long distance.  When all the belongings are in the purse it sits nicely without falling over.  The leather is soft and supple, with a soft shine, and it smells just as I expect authentic leather to smell when new.  Judging by the craftsmanship I expect to use this bag for a long time.  I am going to buy it in brown and white as well.  Great Purse HeShe!  Where have you been all my life?  Very happy customer!!
summary: It was packaged well to insure it arrived in excellent condition. This is the best investment I have ...

reviewText: I ordered the custom sized dress. I measured my bust, waist and hips then added a couple inches to each measurement. The dress is made of a medium weight cotton, so it is not see-thru. The skirt is two layers and included is a small tutu that gives the skirt volume. I didn't realize this, but the long sleeves are actually detachable - so the dress can be worn as a short sleeve dress. I would definitely order from this company again. I chose the express option and the dress was constructed and mailed to me in under 2 weeks.

I have a Titin weighted compression shirt in addition to these shorts. I bought these products because I had been hitting the wall in terms of my PB circuit times for the trails/mountains I run, and I was looking for a way to gain more speed. My plan was to train with the added weight and try to drop to my old PB WITH the weight, then run without the weight on race days. The results of this have been nothing short of spectacular, and both Titin products work great, but in terms of bang for the buck, I think the shorts do more for me based on my primary application despite being lighter than the weighted shirt. A slightly more detailed analysis of that follows.

While you can add more weight with the shirt than you can with the shorts, the weight placement on the shorts is more targeted and makes activities that involve running or climbing stairs quite a bit more difficult than just adding more weight to carry. You're carrying about 1.7lbs (3 gels) around your mid thigh per leg in addition to the gel that is carried higher and closer to your hip, so every time you lift your leg to step, you're lifting that extra weight before pushing off. 1.7lbs may not sound like much, but after a few hundred stairs, you absolutely feel it. In a few hundred more stairs, you start thinking fantasizing about taking the shorts off and burying them. I mean that in the best way possible. But when I run races without the weight, I feel like I'm running on the moon. It's amazing how much lighter and more explosive you feel when you do the same activities without the weight that you'd been doing to train with the weight.

If you already have the Titin compression shirt, I still highly recommend the shorts. Depending on your application, you may benefit from the lower center of gravity that the shorts provide. The shirt alone can make you a little top heavy, although that may be exactly what you're looking for to enhance your workout. In any case, I can't think of a workout that would NOT be enhanced by these items.

Both the shirt and the shorts fit well and keep the gel weights pretty firmly in place. I trail/stair run in both of these products, and the weights do not bounce or take on a life of their own. That was a real concern of mine before spending the serious dollars that these products cost, but Titin seems to have solved that problem. While the shirt system has an extra compression shirt that helps keep the weights secure, I just wear normal workout shorts over the Titin shorts, and it feels just fine. The shorts have a belt mechanism up top to keep them from falling down, and it actually worked surprisingly well. I'm normally a men's medium for things like shorts and underwear, and the medium-sized shorts fit me perfectly.

So why not 5 stars?

Just a few reasons:

1.  Inserting and removing the gel weights is quite a hassle. That's in part just the price you pay for the weights being held so securely in place. Still, in Titin's 2.0 version, I'd like to see weight pockets that were just a little easier to manage, possibly with wider openings and some kind of fastener or flap to close when the weights are in. The weights are a much bigger pain to insert into the shirt, however.

2. The weights themselves are also not particularly washable, and trust me, they are going to get quite sweaty. The gels are coated in some kind of lycra-like fabric, and I've yet to find a really effective way to clean them. They don't smell bio-hazard awful yet, but I feel like they may someday.

3. Cost. These shorts are expensive, and there's not much about them that seems to justify the cost. They are shorts with pockets and a basic belt, and weights are just some kind of gel that probably cost $0.50 to make. They are not spun from spider silk or designed by Jony Ive. The quality is fine, but still, the price point is perhaps a bit high for most people. Similar things might be said about other "simple" fitness products however. I'm looking at you, TRX. In any case, the shorts are significantly cheaper than the shirt, so if you are only going to buy one or just want to try it first, maybe the shorts are the best way to wade in.

My daughter loves it - the deer decal seems ironed on and I'm going to very carefully wash it. The little flower in the deer's ear is not sewn on, but is a pin that you pin on. Again, she loves this because she enjoys moving the pin around on the design - but be careful about positioning it on the decal as it will leave holes. I may end up simply sewing the little flower on so she's not tempted to play with it during class.

This dress is well made and will be super cute with some tights or leggings. The bow that is on the deer's ear is detachable. In fact, it was detached when it arrived in our package, so you may want to make sure you locate it when opening yours. I'd definitely recommend this dress to others. We love it! =)

reviewText:
is it possible for something to be both too small and too large?
because this awful dress found a way to do that!
i am 69" tall with a 44" outseam (waist to floor), so i understand that most dresses are going to be a little shorter on me and that most dresses with tailored waistlines are going to hit a little funny. this was more like a babydoll dress than anything audrey hepburn would be caught dead in.

Exactly what I was looking for - inexpensive vibrant blue dress. The material is lightweight and flows easily. In my opinion the dress is casual because of the fabric so do not expect to get a thick, ridged fabric for a very formal event. Construction is nice and all the seams were finished. Arrived clean and quick.
I rated that it fit a bit large because I had read all the reviews and even measured myself against the manufacturers chart (the second photo in the color dress I was ordering and not the link amazon provides for sizing). I'm normally a medium and the chart said my measurements fit a medium but the reviews said to order a size up. The large had free shipping and returns while the medium only had free shipping and not returns. I opted for the large but I wish I would have stayed with the chart. The waist area is too big but there is a belt and with that cinched you can't tell. The extra fabric just adds to the volume of the skirt area so I will keep it as is. My best guess is that the manufacturer has responded to complaints of the sizes running too small or people have not been measuring themselves wrong and/or choosing the correct corresponding size. Most of the dresses shown fit in the bust and waist area and not in the hip and shoulder area so ignore those. You should then measure yourself (look up how to measure your bust and waist if you aren't sure) and then pick the size off the largest measurement (if you are a 32" bust and a 24"waist then buy the dress size that corresponds to a 32" bust). This is a very tailored cut so if you are large chested and small around the middle you may really need to rely on the belt or have it altered. For the price it could be worth it. If you are looking at one of the dresses with sleeves you will need to take your shoulder width into account.

reviewText: I feel pretty!! Oh so pretty!!! Thanks love my dress......

Horrible doesn't begin to describe it.  I have umbrella's made of better fabric. Problems:
1. I was expecting a soft cotton fabric instead it's a cheap halloween costume fabric.  Even the belt is made of the same fabric and is super flimsy.
2. The dress is not lemon yellow, it's more of a crossing guard neon yellow.
3. And the waist line isn't even in proportion to the dress.  I'm 5'3" and the waist on the medium was more at the bottom of my rib cage and about 2 inches away from my waist.  I tried it on without a bra and I can assure anyone reading this that if I put on a bra the lift alone would raise the waist of the dress about an inch up higher.
4. The skirt of the dress, which in the pictures is full and flares, in reality is not even remotely.  The only way this dress would look like it does in the picture is with another large addition.
5. The dress is MUCH shorter than in the images that show it as being below the knees.
6. SIZE - I'm usually a 6 and the medium fit like a 6.  I will say that this does mean the sizing runs small and the small more than likely fits like a 4.

Even at the price it was not worth it.

I was excited to find a nursing sports bra as it is really hard to feed the baby while wearing a regular sports bra.  I took the plunge and bought it and here's why I wish I hadn't.  Despite clearly stating that I could return this item if it didn't fit, this company is extremely restrictive with that policy.  I tried on my bra after a shower, no deodorant, perfume etc.  it was too big and just didn't fit right.  (See how it pokes out it front in my picture) There was no smaller size to select so I started the return process.  A few weeks later I got the bra back in the mail with a note stating it didn't "meet their standards" for return.  I looked over it with a decerning eye and nose and couldn't find anything wrong.  So- I'm out 25$ and I will never order from them again.
summary: Company doesn't actually accept returns.  Make sure you choose right size

I selected that this babydoll lingerie is 'somewhat small' and I should clarify... It does indeed fit and will fit most sizes due to the babydoll style and the large, flowing sheer piece at the waist. However, I find it hard to imagine that the pieces covering the bust are flattering on just about anyone. On my larger chest (36C), they offer minimal coverage and a very unflattering appearance. Due to the 'one size' it is not tailored properly and offers no support or even adequate coverage or shape.

Likes
+ pretty color
+ will fit most shapes and sizes, but may not fit well or as flattering as hoped

Dislikes
- cheap construction
- strings everywhere
- not flattering for all shapes or sizes
- feels cheap

Besides not liking the fit, I also didn't find the construction to be very good. There are strings everywhere and the edges of the lace and sewing to the straps are sloppy. It looks very cheap overall.

I did receive this baby doll at a free or discounted rate in exchange for my honest review

So I purchased this on a whim. I was very worried because it says one size fits all, which is not ever really the case. I wear a size large and was worried that it would look ridiculous on me. There are a lot of clothing items on line that are in Asian sizing and I was worried this outfit would run way too small, but it did not. I believe it is would fit up to maybe a size 14. The breast area is a little small so if you are big breasted it will just cover the lower portion, which could be bad or good considering what you are purchasing. The part that wraps around your chest is made of very stretchy elastic, so it could fit someone very small and someone like me who wears a size large with a little extra space. Believe me, I am very self conscious of my weight and appearance and this actually looked fine on me. Although it is shear, it is like a baby doll top so it covers your flaws well. The panties are stretchy as well so they could also fit different sized people. It came in a plastic zip lock type bag. The bow was on there nicely and did not look cheap. The outfit is made well. It has adjustable spaghetti straps so again you can customize the fit. Overall, great lingerie set. I was impressed. I purchased this lingerie set at a discounted price to give my honest review and this is my honest review of the Amilia Sling Deep V Neck Floral Sheer See Through Lingerie Set.
summary: which could be bad or good considering what you are purchasing

reviewText:
Continuing the journey of spicing things up in the bedroom! This see through baby doll camisole with matching thong is so sexy! My husband loves when I dress up for him and a lot of lingerie sets just do not come in my size or are not flattering to my body style. My go to is always baby doll camisoles as they cover a lot but still make me fell and look good.  The top is held in place with a single elastic strap. It stretches very large so it will fit most any women. The fabric is super soft and sheer and helps keep you cool while getting down to business. The stitching is done very well with no stray or frayed ends. The panties are also very stretchy and will fit a lot of waist sizes. The color was identical to the one pictured being very dark red. The price of the product is GREAT!!! Compared to others on the market this one comes in cheaper while still maintaining a good quality product.

Overall I give this baby doll camisole 4 stars. It looks good, Makes me feel sexy, and drives my husband wild!!! I would recommend this for any women who is hesitant to dress up sexy for your significant other. These cover you well while still remaining exciting for the senses!

reviewText:
The Roludom Men's Cotton Colorful Padded Hoodie Casual Coat arrived quickly and in good condition sealed in a plastic bag.  This is a very well made coat!  The inside is made of a faux fur lining for wonderful added warmth.  The outer shell is very nice and well made also. This jacket has a very sturdy zipper closure as well as strong snaps. It also features 2 outer zip pockets. It's padded for thickness and added warmth. The hoodie is warm and is able to be completely removed if you choose to not use it. It's tightened around the neck with a wide strong rope. I purchased the beige and blue jacket and it's very impressive with it's bold, strong colors.

Now the warning!!! Please double check the size chart.  I'd read a review that it's a bit smaller than US sizes so I ordered the XXXL. It's actually much smaller than that. I would say they're even smaller than the chart by a size. PLEASE pay attention to their size chart!  NOTE(SIZE) Large = US SmallX-Large = US MediumXX-Large = US LargeXXX-Large = US X-Large

I purchased this for a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.

Pros:
Beautiful jacket
Very well made
Great features

Cons:
VERY SMALL compared to US sizes
summary: Beautiful, well made jacket but VERY small.

this is a really beautiful hat!! and not only that, the straw materials used to construct this brim hat is of high quality.  i owned couple other straw hats and honestly, this fare a lot better!  the straws are weaved beautifully and tightly.  it is also feels soft and smooth to the touch.  i cannot even feel any strand of straw or thread poking out, that just shows that it was crafted carefully and with full attention to details. the hat itself is bendable, perfect when i need to fold and stuff inside my purse!  it is very durable but does not feel flimsy at all.  very good export quality and definitely not cheaply made.  the color combination of ivory/yellow along with the vibrant pink & dainty yellow floral accents made this straw hat looks very chic! this hat has a potential to be worn either casually or can be dressed up, depending on your whole outfit.  as for the fit, it fit as i expected and it stayed on comfortably. the attached garter comes in very handy to keep the hat in place when it becomes windy. although the brim is wide enough to protect my face i wish it can go a little bit wider to be able to cover the back of my neck entirely as well. but other than that, i am still happy and satisfied with the quality and the overall elegant look of this straw hat.

disclaimer: i have received this product either free or below its retail price for testing purposes in exchange for my unbiased review and honest opinion.
summary: excellently crafted, very chic, lovely colors

reviewText: This is Huge. The box it came in was big. No small person can wear this. 5'6" or more only. 6' tall 44 chest fit OK. It needs extra padding inside and some surgery to increase venting and visibility. DO not wear if you have latex issues. Latex smells. It is heavy. The shoulder spikes are awkward. All this aside, this is truly amazing. It is actually scary. I can not believe I got this for this price. The mouth tentacles are wired so you can pose them. You will make small children cry, so do not wear near them or susceptible adults. Just stay inside until after 9pm. Or have a person in front of you with a disclaimer. You will cause serious panic if you add prop blood, goo, or webbing. It says amphibious but would make a great alien spider.
So awesome!

I bought this mask to go with my cosplay costume for comicon. It rocked! People loved it and wanted to take pictures with me.  The tentacles protruding from the mouth are bendable so you can make it look as crazy as you want. It does run a bit large even on me and I'm 6 ft 300 pounds. And it's quite heavy. The eyes are sort of far apart so seeing straight on can be a bit of a challenge. I used a towel stuffed behind my head to make the mask fit better and to also make it more comfortable.  This mask is great for us halloweenies,  it even comes with a personal message from the sculptor which was sweet of him. Definitely recommend if your budget is allowing.

I knew I was going to love these shoes but I didn't realize just how much a would love them! These are so comfortable (and this is coming from a flat shoe lover). I think the chunkier heel really makes these a breeze to walk in and surprisingly supportive on your heel. The laces are not only cute but really help the shoes support your ankle, which also adds to the comfort factor. The tread on the bottom keeps these from being slippery on tile floors as well. I love that they came in plastic bags because if you have ever owned a pair of shoes made from this material, you know how easy they are to scuff and ding. I am definitely going to be purchasing these in the wine color and looking further into any other shoes from this brand!

LOVE, I am in LOVE with these shoes.  They are the perfect blend of comfort, height and velvet beauty! They fit perfectly in the half size that I need, I was very excited they are offered in half sizes.  When I first opened the box  I was concerned about wearing them all day due to the height they would give me, at under 5 feet I always try not to hurt myself for height!  These have become a staple to my work wardrobe, the black was a perfect choice.  The Goldie Lace Up heel is very comfortable and the design of the heel is easy to walk in due to the wedge of it. reviewText: These lace up heel ankle boots are cute and give you some height. They are made out of a suede type material and have a one inch platform. The heel is thick so I don't feel like I am going to twist my ankle when I wear these and they have a non-skid sole. I was surprised on how comfortable they fit me, but it did take me a few days to get use to the height and walking in them though. I don't wear heels except on special occasions so I'm not use to walking in heels. The heel is about 4 inches with the 1 inch platform. I ordered a size 9 because that is what I usually wear in a dress shoe and these were just a little big. I would recommend you get the size you normally wear in a sneaker since these are true to size. I thought these looked cute with a pair of jeans or a maxi skirt which is what I wear in the spring and summer. These ankle boots are well made and I would recommend them to anyone looking for a cute platform heel boot. I received this pair of Goldie lace up heel boots at a discount in exchange for my honest unbiased opinion and I was not told what to say.

I just received these shoes today and I'm pleased. I usually wear a size 9 (so I bought that size) but I should have gotten an 8.5, but other than that I have no complaints, I can just wear thick socks with these. These shoes are made wonderfully, and seem like they won't fall apart. I never wear heels and I bought these to just have a pair and I am glad I chose these. They add about an extra three inches to my height and make my legs look really nice and feel stable when I walk.

Absolutely love these shoes, stylish! comfortable! cute! What more can you ask for. Obviously only time will tell, but they seem to be very well made and should hold up well.  Sometimes a lace up shoe like this will cheap out on the laces and I end up replacing them with my own, but these are have great laces, weird to note I guess, but true none the less. They fit according to size, not too big or small, though they do leave a nice amount of toe wiggle room. reviewText: stretches a little to much but very comfortable

I found the description to be accurate and like that they have a three hook back closure. The fabric is far more stretchy than I anticipated although soft to the touch. The back band was extremely loose, again I followed chart provided by seller, and the cup/getting area was fine, more coverage than anticipated. As others have mentioned the padding is awkward. Even after adjusting and unfolding them out looked as though I had "two thick paper plates" (comment from partner) that are too small to cover the whole area so it looks even worse. If the band had been tight enough I would've attempted it by taking them out but it is far too loose. I will return and look for a brand that has slightly sturdier band.

reviewText:
I ordered these slipper shoes for a friends daughter that just turned one.  I ordered the 12-18mo size with the bunnies, strawberries and bears and think they are very cute.  The slipper shoes are crew length socks with a faux leather trim sewn on.  The bottoms are covered in grip stop material.  The socks are thicker and are very soft.  At the toe of each shoe is a stuffed character which is attached with heavy adhesive.  I tried to see if I could pull one off, but it wasn't budging.

My friends daughter is in the 90th percentile based on her size and these shoes were a bit big on here, but not so much that they were falling off.  They did shift around a bit when she was crawling, but so do normal socks.  These slipper shoes are great for cooler days when going out and about as they keep the babys feet nice and cozy.  Overall I am pleased with the design and quality of these slipper shoes and my friends daughter seemed to like them as well.
I was given the opportunity to purchase this product free of charge in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The product I received does not look like the item pictured.  I bought these gloves because I thought the rounded studs were small, cute, and somewhat unique without being too heavy.  The gloves that I actually received have big and bulky large square studs (please see the picture that I shared).  I would like to note that these studs are made of metal where I feel as though smaller circular studs would not weigh at much as these square studs.  In addition, some of the square studs look as though they are about to fall off in the packaging.  I did not take them out of the packaging to try them on and to test out the comfort and feel of the glove's.  By just feeling the weight of the packaging, I feel as though large studs would be too heavy for the back of my hands.  I also think the square studs look like an eye sore.  If I were to have gloves with square studs, I would prefer that there we not as many studs.

I have a couple of other drapey vests and loved the way this one looks in the photo on the hanger.  When I got it though, it just doesn't seem to look/lay like that in real life.  I wish there were more pictures of it and some showing it worn different ways on a person too.

It is more like a big scarf with arm holes rather than an actual vest.  The fabric is lightweight and fairly sheer, which is fine, but it seems almost too light ... like it is weirdly flowy and flys about, almost like a cape in the wind.  I also feel like there is too much fabric on the top/collar part.

I've tried wearing it a few different times, the long and the short way (one way is just upside down from the other), but I just can't find anyway that it really looks/feels right to me.  I've tried to wear it several times, with a tshirt, long sleeve shirt, with a dress, or a tank top, but always end up changing and not wearing it because of the way it lays and flows too much.

Maybe it's just me ... I guess I will keep trying, but right now it looks like I may end up donating this one.

I strongly recommend that you don't waste your time ordering from this seller until the reviews start reflecting they are properly sized.  BTW, I sent the product back about a year ago and I still haven't received a refund! They keep saying that they can't find my return.

I've ordered lots of pajamas from Leveret for my two children. They are always great quality: soft materials; bright, colorfast designs; minimal shrinkage as expected with a 100% cotton garment; and sturdy, having been passed down from my older to my younger. The orders are always on time, shipped promptly. The backing/inside of embroidered designs are covered with a soft material to minimize scratchiness. They do fit slim because they are cotton (kids' pajamas are required to be snug-fitting unless polyester), so be aware of that when ordering.

We bought these pajamas for our three-year-old grandniece, who stays overnight at our house every week or two. As soon as we put them on her, she said "Ooh! So soft!" She loved them. The fit is snug - not tight, but snug - but the enclosed tag says that they are supposed to be snug. At any rate, our three-year-old authority loves how they feel and loves the color.
summary: These PJs have our three-year-old's seal of approval

reviewText: A little big on top, but the rest fits perfectly. The dress is beautiful and much prettier in person than in the pictures.

I originally purchased this dress in a sz 10 and it was too big. I am 5' 4 1/2" 167lbs and wear a 36 D. The sz 8 fits much better slightly snug but not too tight. I love how soft the dress is. It falls just above my knees which is perfect for me. You can wear a strapless nude bra but expect if you have a large bust that the bra will show slightly due to the material underneath doesn't go as far as the lace. My only issue is is that the under lining in the chest area holds very little.

The dress is lovely, as the other reviewers say. I am 5'2", usually a size 8 and I got the size 8 because it seemed to match my measurements best. There is some extra fabric around the lower back area (probably the reason that the waist measurement is larger than most size 8 waists). I knew ahead of time that this section might be too big. Additionally, the top hangs very low on me, so I will definitely have to wear a camisole underneath. I imagine that if I had gotten a size smaller, the top would have fit better but the bottom would have been too small, which I anticipated after looking at the measurement chart. Nevertheless, this dress is lovely and I look forward to wearing it at my aunt's wedding.

I highly suggest looking at their measurement chart and doing some measurements on yourself before choosing which size to purchase. When in doubt, order the small size for this item.

- Color. I ordered teal but it's really more emerald/brilliant green, nothing of teal. It was a huge disappointment as I expected it to be a bridesmaid dress for my friend's teal-and-blue wedding. Could not wear it, it looks green! :(

- Bust line. It is 2 inches lower than needed, you can see my nude bra through the lace part because of it - I marked it red in the second photo. It is not a problem if you know how to do fitting.
summary: be aware of the color: teal is relly green

reviewText:
Wasn't  expecting much as this dress was only $9.99.  I have a Marina dress that is pretty much exactly the same style as this one I bought a few years ago for about $100.
I'm 5'0" 128lbs.  I bought 3 of these dresses 2 in 6 and 1 in 8 (teal, white, black).  Each of the dresses fit differently.  One of the size 6's was huge- really felt like it was mislabeled- could've easily been a 12.  Serious quality control problems. Nonetheless- I did like the dresses.
The dress I ALMOST kept was the size 6 teal.
PROs:  Teal color as actually lovely- looks much more classy than I expected from the picture.  Its a deep jewel-toned teal.  The monochrome teal beading and sequins actually elevate the look of the dress rather than make it look cheap. Can't really beat the dress for the price.
CONs: Sewing wasn't best quality.  some small pieces of lace were not sewn into the seam.  There's also a weird tulip-shape/flip out to the bottom hem.  Not sure if that was intentional because it wasn't symmetric on both sides of the dress.  Would have been better if the hem was straight/more pencil-line. Also -If you are moderately busty like me- this dress shows a rather lot of cleavage.  It doesn't look bad from the front, but I'm short and looking down from the top - borders on lookiing like you're falling out of the dress.  ALSO- there is opaque fabric at the bust underneath the lace sleeves but it is much too small an area for effective coverage.  And because of that- unless you have teal undergarments- basically your friends and family will be looking at your bra or spanx underneath the lace.  No bueno.
Also, there is no petite sizing so, I felt like I could have shortened the length from the princess seam to the shoulders- felt like the shoulders were going to fall off all the time- but if you're taller it might not be a problem for you.

I almost kept it and was going to try to sew up the areas that were weird on me- for $10 you can't go wrong--, and it really was a beautiful color... but I really just didn't need another dress.
summary: Sizes are inconsistent.  Some quality issues.  Pretty color.

reviewText: For the price it's just waooou I like the dresse the material it's more than I expected

I was so beyond impressed when I received this beautiful dress! I find it hard to tell when I order clothing online whether it is going to be true to size or how it is ultimately going to look when I finally try it on, so I was very happy that when I received the dress, it fit perfectly. Before ordering I carefully read the size chart and chose a size 8. The chart gave me exactly the measurements I needed, so I didn't have to guess what to order. The dress is flattering from every angle and it isn't tight or binding anywhere ~ including the bust or waist. The construction of the dress is beautiful in every way. There is a matching slip underneath the lace that is sewn into the dress itself. My complaint with most dresses like this is that the lace will ride up when you sit or bend over exposing the slip, but this dress actually has the slip sewn strategically into the lace over it (including about an inch from the bottom hem), so it will always stay where right where it is supposed to and move naturally with me. The lace and the beading are gorgeous - intricate and elegant without being gaudy. Everything is sewn so nicely too - no loose threads and no loose beads anywhere. The entire dress is lightweight to wear as well and it comes to just above the knee so it can be worn for a variety occasions. The design is flattering for so many body types. I feel elegant and feminine when I wear this and I would not hesitate to buy another garment from this designer again or recommend this dress to anyone woman wanting to feel good about what she is wearing when she wants to look her best. I did receive this product at a a discount in exchange for my honest opinion.

My mother loves to go dancing and also hosts a lot of parties. I'm always on the lookout for cute and fashionable dresses for her. She likes a sophisticated and modern look, without going overboard.

This dress caught my eye, so I ordered it as a Christmas gift. Since I'm similar in size, I tried it on to check the fit and be sure it wasn't too small or large. It's pretty spot on, although someone with a smaller waist might have to pull it in a bit. It's still not enough of an issue for me to consider it as running large. I also loved the fact that it's true to the length shown in the photos! Some cheaper dresses tend to arrive and are WAY too short. That is not at all an issue with this dress. It's the perfect length, just as the pictures show.

The lace and beading is not done any justice, by the photos. I took a close up pic to add to my review and show readers. It's a beautiful fabric and beading, up close. The color might be a hair more blue than teal, but it's still gorgeous.

I absolutely adore this dress and I know my mom will love it. I'm going to order another one for myself. This dress was sold to me at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review.

It's not often you find a dress you can wear for school, Christmas (I got the golden dress, as you can see), or a night on the town. I kept finding items in my collection that went great with this dress and created completely different outfits.  Accessorizers, you'll love this dress.

No matter the occasion you choose, know that you won't be scratching your neck or shoulders in this dress like some other lacy outfits. Also, you won't be leaving a sequine trail everywhere you go. Those babies are sewn securely with beads and thread rather than the typical thin clear plastic line through tiny holes in the sequine. reviewText: I really like this dress!  It fits well too - I'm 5'2" and about 105 pounds, and the XS fits perfectly (maybe even a little tiny bit tight).  Just a warning though, if you wash it some of the pleated details on the top will fall right out, there are a few small stitches to hold it together but not enough.  Also, DO NOT PUT THIS IN THE DRIER.  I did on the delicate setting which is low heat, I just didn't want to have to hang it up fully wet, and sure enough it shrunk.  It didn't shrink in a way that it stopped fitting, but the zipper got all wrinkly.

This dress has just the right amount of stretch with a nice thickness to the fabric. MUXXN has continued to provide consistent quality in their products. It is well made and looks great. This dress also washes nicely and is fairly wrinkle resistant. I washed it on cold and let it air dry, with a quick ironing it looks fresh again. Buyers should note that the color is slightly darker than pictured. I would recommend this to others.

reviewText:
This JACKET is nothing like the picture, why?
1. Colour: The yellow I received is NEON yellow, too bright.

3. Design: Totally different from the picture. The fake pockets on the picture show different sizes in thickness of the checkered parts. The jacket sent
  to me, both the checkered sections are the same thickness, the small size. This makes the jacket look odd. The checkered section on the
  curf on the picture looks like it has a slit and folds back, but on mine both are missing, it is a continuous, non folding section
4. Size: The length on me (5' 3") is up to the waist, it does not come down as shown on the picture around the hips. In addition, it is like a tightly
  fitted jacket not boyfriend look. The jacket reaches my wrists only.
This jacket has TO GO BACK IMMEDIATELY, tomorrow it has to be in the mail.

I bought these glasses for a halloween party, and they were pretty darn cool.....until they stopped working.  After approximately 1.5 hours of use, the light went out and never came back on.  I immediately thought the batteries died, so I replaced them with new ones I had with me, but that didn't rectify the problem.  I visually inspected the wiring and the neon piping, but there was no obvious damage or loose parts.  The red light on the battery pack lit up with each press of the button as I toggled through the lighting options (solid, slow blink, fast blink), and seeing as though the batteries and battery pack were working, I concluded that it was a wiring issue likely stemming from dancing.

I contacted Amazon about the problem, whose outstanding customer support issued me a refund upon receipt of my glasses.

I rated 4 stars because the glasses were of good quality, and were what I expected based on videos and pictures I viewed prior to purchase.  One thing I DEFINITELY advise, is to order the clear lenses if wearing them in a low light setting, you'll be glad you did.

Love it!

What can I say - I love this shirt. Not only does it have a really cool, geeky design - it's also extremely comfotable and it fit just as expected.

It's got an extremely funny message - combining the middle ages with the periodic table of the elements - so it's perfect for your geek friend, your science friend, or your friend who just likes funny or ironic tees.

I've been frustrated with how shirts have not only fitted, but felt recently - and from now on, I'm going to look for ringspun cotton in my tees, and pay attention.

One important note about the care of this tee - it is not silkscreened; the image is printscreened, so that requires specific care. I would recommend turning it inside out before washing, using the gentle cycle with no fabric softener, and laying flat to dry. No hangers, because they could stretch the material while it's wet. Tumble it on low in the dryer to get rid of wrinkles.

Ann Arbor T-shirt Co. has a number of really funny tees in its catalog here on Amazon. I haven't worn any of them, but the selections are definitely worth checking out for you or the geek in your life!

I received this at a discount in exchange for an honest review. All opinions are my own.

reviewText:
I purchased this tshirt for my husband, who enjoys nerdy humor. The shirt fits very well, sized as expected. The tshirt is made of a very soft material, and it is well made. None of the image or color of the shirt itself has faded in the laundry.

Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I have had the hardest time buying tee shirts forever. They just never fit. This is the best fitting tee shirt I have found in a LONG time.

I tend to always land right between Medium and Large, where medium is just a little too small and large is just a little too big. On this one, after looking carefully at the description, I chose the XL size and it fits perfectly. Go figure.

This shirt is pretty high quality. The material is a bit on the thin side, though I don't think that is a sign of bad material. It is just the kind of material the maker used on the shirt. I personally like my tee shirts a little bit thinner anyway.

The seams are strong and seem like they will hold up to normal wear and tear. I don't see any strings that were left hanging off during the manufacturing process.

The tag is printed on the inside of the shirt. So there is no tag hanging out bugging your neck.

The printing on the shirt is also nice quality. It is pretty normal tee shirt printing. I've had some other tee shirts that have the image off center or have folds in the printing. This shirt doesn't do any of that. The colors are vibrant (it looks like there are 3 colors used) and the lines are sharp. This shirt is a kind of weird mashup of chemistry and Game of Thrones themes called "Noble Gases." I'm not sure I get it honestly.  But as a t-shirt, it is goofy enough that I'll probably wear it anyway.

These shirts are also made in the USA. I'm not usually too picky about these things, but it is nice to think there is a factory in Michigan making the shirt I am wearing.

I received a small discount on this shirt for agreeing to honestly review it. But I liked it so much, I went and bought 2 more (different designs) immediately after I got this one. I've worn one every day since I got them.
summary: This is the best fitting tee shirt I have found in a LONG ...

reviewText: I love this! It is pretty small considering it is a large. I bought this while I was still pregnant and I put two pieces together (it comes with three pieces) to make it larger and used it as a maternity back brace. About two weeks postpartum, I could wear it normally. I use to have a one piece girdle that hurt to wear because it didn't have any give and that's important after you've had a baby and still swollen and in some pain. I recommend this product because it has different functions and you can adjust it however you need it.
Forget laxatives, try natural fiber. It works as well and helps defer some of the calories consumed.

I heard about Perfect 7 years ago, from a friend who was raving about it. So I decided it was time to try it out. But as a person who has studied medical herbalism (including colon cleansing substances) for decades, I'm extremely unimpressed. The product is a blend of 7 ingredients, in supposedly just the right proportions for the best cleansing result. But here's the problem: even though I would expect such a product to include psyllium seed as the primary ingredient, in this case the other ingredients are present in such minute amounts that (1) you can barely tell they're present at all, and (2) the small quantities of these other ingredients make for a product that has no greater cleansing action than plain psyllium without any additional herbs. I've used many such products, and this one I feel is very poorly formulated, and gives you a false idea that there is some kind of special synergistic action from the combination. You would be better off either buying another product, or at least just buying plain psyllium, because it would cost you a lot less money. Honestly: for a lot less money, I could make a far more effective product without even trying.
summary: Over-hyped, expensive product. It's mainly just psyllium. Don't waste your money.

The material is stretchy but doesn't have that cheesy elastic look or feel. It feels like a nice thick cotton and is perfect with thin sweater that can be tucked in for fall. Again, maybe someone taller would be ok, but then the dress might be too short. It was not long on me. In fact, with a small heel, it would have been just right in the length. But other than the fit, I just didn't like the look of the dress. It looks good in the picture, but in person, the lace is very shiny and looks cheap. The lining is a nude color, which doesn't show in the pic, but does show under the white part. The top of the dress is padded, almost too padded, but is not supportive. This also made the top look weird. I think you could get away with a strapless bra, but I didn't try it. Also, not sure if the pictures show it or not, but the black lace extends out in the back to form a train.

reviewText: I love the look and feel of this canvas messenger bag from Baosha. It says it is a men's bag but anyone can use this and look great! I want it for myself not my husband. Maybe we can share it... This canvas material is very strong and durable. It can take lots of abuse. This feels like it is well built and will last me a long time. The bag is sporty looking but still remains elegant. The strap is easily adjustable. You can make it very long or shorter. It is a thick durable strap that will not be breaking easily. The strap is a little different tone color of beige than the actual bag. That is fine with me because I think it breaks up the color pattern and adds a nice touch to the bag. The front flap closes with 2 magnetic buttons. Under the flap are 2 zippered compartments. I really like that this bag has a separate front zippered compartment. That way I can keep some thing seperate and easily have access to them when I need them. The zippers are well made and durable also. The main zippered compartment is nice and wide. Lots of room there to put all my things. There is an extra zippered pocket inside the main compartment wall. On the other wall are 2 open pockets. One smaller and one larger. The back of the messenger bag also has a zippered compartment. Great messenger bag with lots of places to put all my things securely. I highly recommend it to men and women alike. Please see my video where I show you all the compartments. **I received this item free of charge in exchange for my honest unbiased review.
summary: Awesome bag for men or women.

In fact, he has a nscd diamond TESTER.  He says that unless you are an expert jeweler walking around with a tester you would never know that this is not a mined diamond. Now, nscd diamonds are like any mined diamond. Some are prettier and brighter and have more fire than others. This ring in particular however has lots and lots of fire. Very very beautiful ring. Very well made. I definitely recommend it.  Now, this is a 4 carat diamond. If you don't like a stone this big, this is probably not the ring for you. Me, I love love love mine! Once you see this ring in person I'm pretty sure you will fall in love as well.

I got this to wear on Halloween. I had previously only bought items like this that were Sazac brand and had really liked those, but decided to get this one since the picture looked the same and this was less expensive (like $20 difference at the time). I was a little disappointed when I received this because it was definitely cheap costume quality and not at all the nice fleecy feel of the Sazac stuff we usually get. I figured I would keep it though since I really only bought this as a costume for Halloween. Well, then it was just downhill from there. As soon as I put it on, one of the buttons fell off. This thing is very wide (as these usually are made wide to fit all sizes) so it was not because it had any pressure being put on the button. As the night went on, another button fell off. Then a third button fell off when I took the costume off. Like someone mentioned before, the feel of this is more "felt" like on the outside and then a kind of jersey like fabric on the inside. There are no pockets, figured I would mention that as well. I am giving two stars instead of one because, overall, the costume is cute and comfortable enough to wear for just one day. Don't expect this to last you any longer than one day though. If you want something that will last, I recommend going with a Sazac version and pay the extra money. I would not buy this brand again and would not recommend this particular item to others.

Super warped. Wouldn't recommend. The lenses wouldn't stay in because the frame was so warped. I realize they are a cheap pair but come on, you can't send us junk. I'm in the process of sending them back.

These do not cover the entire visual field, leaving a significant gap at the bottom.

Normally this did not bother me.  However, when hiking on stony terrain in bright sun, it became very difficult to see the ground ahead.  The lower edge of the lens overlapped the ground between 6 and 15 feet ahead, making it difficult to see what was really there, which caused me to stumble several times.

I will never take these hiking again.

For other uses, they are fine.

The Blue Iron Cross pendant is made of pewter and is about an inch and a quarter in height and width. The ring for the necklace has been widened, apparently, since this item's original release- I recall buying one back in 2005 or so and the ring was much smaller. Guess Dan Jewelers- seems they're the maker- got some complaints about that. I appreciate their efforts, but I think they could've gone for a medium instead of large ring-size-increase. Anyway. More importantly, while the pendant came very nicely packaged in clear plastic, placed in a small black pouch no bigger than the palm of one's hand, it had for a necklace a much-too-cheap rope-thing. Some kind of black synthetic rope material. The older one I had came with a simple metal chain necklace- like that found on dog-tags- and that worked a lot better. That's what I did with mine- took the chain from some surplus ROTC dog-tags, and placed that on the pendant instead. I'd like to see the manufacturer give us a choice of factory-issue pendants, but it's not that hard to do a little extra work and get the right necklace yourself.

Having been sold since 2005 at least, this Iron Cross pendant has certainly endured on the marketplace. There's at least two other versions, the difference being the color in the center of the cross- the other two are red and black. This pendant is well-made and looks good, and the price of $13- plus shipping, of course- I paid is about right. I can certainly recommend it.
summary: Great pendant, but that cheap necklace has gotta go.

reviewText:
I love this Pizza slice necklace. Yes I suppose you could easily use this as a friendship necklace, and it would be a really cute idea, but I love it just as is. My father owns a Pizza restaurant and has since before I was born, so I grew up a pizza maker's daughter. Now I work there and my boys come up with Momma to work sometimes and so the tradition continues. This necklace is perfect and I get comments on it all the time because it fits me so well. I like the fact that it isn't overly shiney or fake looking and the charm is attached securely, I don't worry about it falling off while I'm wearing it. It is very affordable too, so even bigger bonus, especially if you're planning to buy a few as a friendship necklace. It hangs to the right place, right below the collar of most of my shirts and doesn't turn my skin green, even after wearing it a couple days in a row. I'm so happy with this necklace and wish I could use all the slices on one chain to make a complete pie or chance it up but I'm not complaining! It's too fun!
 I did receive receive pizza necklace free or for a promotional price for testing and evaluation purposes. I was not paid for my review and was asked only to provide any feedback I may have about the product. My review is solely based on my experience and honest opinion of this necklace.
summary: Such a cute design. Detail is well done and quality material.

reviewText: Very cute. Just too small

When these arrived, I was super nervous.  I was expecting them to be stretchy around the waste but they are not.  If you're any larger than me, these probably aren't the capri leggings for you.  If you're my size or smaller, they're perfect!

The material is awesome.  It's so slick and smooth.  I really love it.  The pattern looks great; there's no issues with the alignment.  The colors are accurate and the leggings do go past the knees some.  And now for the best part.  THERE ARE POCKETS!  Yes pockets and they're down the side in that black/gray strip you see.  They're tiny but they are big enough to hold lip balm or your locker key!

I highly recommend this brand as the quality is that superb.  I'll definitely come back and buy more!

Regarding size, these are my specs:  I'm 5-6 and wear (for comparison) Victoria's Secret size Medium for leggings. So 28/29" waist, 38/40" hip, 22/24" thigh.

This necklace is much nicer than I had originally anticipated!! I'm always a little hesitant with buying pearls online because they usually tend to look cheap, but this necklace is actually very pretty and doesn't look cheap at all. The pearls are an off-white cream color and are graduated in size from the ends to the center. When stretched out, the pearl section of the necklace measures about 18" long, and there is a 3.5" silver chain at one end so that you can adjust the length. It has a lobster claw clamp, and the pearl stands are strung on what appears to be fairly heavy-duty wire. I love the "twisted" design of the pearl strands - it has a very classy and elegant look. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend this necklace to others.

*Discounted product received for testing and review purposes. I have no affiliate with the seller or manufacturing company, and I did not receive any compensation for testing or reviewing the product. All opinions are my own and were not influenced by the seller in any way.

**UPDATE - 9/23/16**
The first time I wore this necklace, I only had it on for about 4-5hrs total and was very careful with putting it on and taking it off. However, the second time I put it on (again, carefully), I got in my car to leave for school and as I was pulling out of my driveway, I started to hear a noise that sounded like little beads hitting the sides of my car door and floor. I looked down and realized that one of the necklace strands had broken and the pearls were falling ALL over my car. I tried cleaning up all the pearls that had scattered all over my car, but I'm still finding little pearls here and there randomly. I'm so disappointed because I really liked this necklace!!!! I can technically still wear it with only 2 strands of the pearls, but now I'm paranoid that the other strands are also going to break and make a mess (and potentially be fall risk if the pearls go all over the floor).  :(
summary: **UPDATED 9/23** - Broke the Second Time Ever Worn

Time is winding down for a Mother's Day gift, and this trendy necklace for mother's of all ages. It color is like a rose gold. It can be accompanied with any outfit and earrings (as long as they are gold). The wording on the necklace is "love" which could perfectly explain how you feel about your mother. The "key" signifies that you only have one mother and she is the only one that has that particular key to your heart. It is shaped in a heart with crystal rhinestones on the side with the writing "love". The chain itself is not too fragile, I wouldn't advise you to pull it either ( I did just to see the strength of the necklace). Of course the necklace itself is a rose gold color and brings out the beauty of the charm itself. The sideways heart is a unique design, which gives this jewelry more "spunk''. When you wear this, the  charm will stop in mid area of your chest. I would definitely recommend this necklace to everyone, it is a "must" you add this to your jewelry collection! I promise you will not regret this purchase.

reviewText: This belt looks so much better in person! I am so excited for my son to pull it out of his Christmas stocking, he is going to freak!

We had looked for a belt for our Hulk crazy 5 year old for a long time. All  we could find were adult sizes that were huge on the little guy. For Christmas we got him this one in the smallest size and it fits great with a little room to grow. It is good quality and sized so that it goes through a 5 year olds belt loops perfectly with the cutest little buckle.
Picture looks blue but they are black
Love it definitely buy.

The quality of the belt is nice, but it has one major issue, and one minor issue.

The major issue is that the adjustment mental clip is to big to go through quite a lot of jean belt loops. I have about 5 different brands of jeans over 20 pairs and this only goes through 2 of them. I haven't ever had this issue with any other belt that I have ever owned or used.

The minor issue is that I think they really should offer reverse belts. Going from Left-to-Right is very uncomfortable and unintuitive if you own dozens of other belts and they all go Right-to-Left.

Other notes:
The print quality doesn't quite look like the stock photos so I added one. It's not bad, but it's different enough that it's worth adding a photo.

Overall I would not buy another Buckle-Down belt mainly due to the fact I can only wear it with two pairs of pants that I don't even wear that often. Even if I could wear the belt with more pants I would be extremely hesitant to ever buy another Left-to-Right belt.
summary: Good for collecting, bad for daily use.

She loves it. I'm only sorry we didn't think of it sooner to save her all those chilly shower exits. The robe is very soft, and its nice and thick which is of course preferable,and it has a good sturdy "hang-loop" in the collar for hanging  it maybe on the back of the bathroom door. This looked like a nice belt when it arrived, but looks were deceiving in this case.  I bought this belt in mid July, I hardly ever have occasion to wear belts in the summer since I usually only wear them with long pants or jeans, so it got very little use until September.  Since that time I have worn it probably about 2 months worth of use.  The back side of the belt started to wear some at the belt hole I was using by October.  By the end of December it had worn completely through the backside piece of leather and some sort of black liner stitched in between the back side and the top side.  The top side is still holding together well, likely a higher quality piece of leather, but with the backside torn all the way through, the belt is almost unusable now.  I have leather belts I've worn for well over 20 years that are still in very good shape.  This is either a defective product or just a poorly manufactured one.  The company had no interest in seeing photos of the belt, they just denied my getting a replacement, or refund.  I recommend staying away from this product and the company, both are substandard in my view.

NOTE: I am very judicious about giving poor review as anyone can see from my profile, however this product and the company lack of interest in resolving my complaint warranted this review.  I never had a direct reply from the company, I only learned they denied any replacement or refund when I inquired again through Amazon.  Photos attached show the how bad it is after only a couple of months worth of wear.

[[ASIN:B013JGSVVG Heshe Imported New Fashion Organizer Purse Clutch Shoulder Crossbody Wristlet Bag Satchel Handbag]

This is the nicest bag I have ever had the pleasure of owning, and at 74 years old I've owned a lot!  It is the first crossbody bag I've had and 100% filled the specific purpose I originally bought it for. I needed to be hands free managing my luggage but with easy access to ticket and ID on a trip.  My older shoulder bags don't stay on my shoulder.  This bag has an adjustable strap for easy placement in the perfect position.  It has more compartments than anyone would ever need, including lots of card slots plus 4 full-width zippered compartments. I don't need a wallet with this bag.  As far as aesthetics,it is both a pleasure to physically handle and it is classically elegant in slim profile for any dressy event.  Removing the strap gives you a slim clutch.  The fine-grained leather is smooth and meltingly soft.  Needless to say, this is my one bag now. And no, I don't work for this company nor am I related to anyone who does, just a very happy purchaser!

reviewText: I like the idea of this belt. It is an interesting design concept as I like the idea of having an infinitely adjustable belt. But unfortunately where it stands tall on promise, it falls short on delivery. After having had this belt for a few months now, it is starting to slip on its own. I'm just a regular guy and only wear it during the day while I'm at work. I have another belt that I wear when I'm home and working in my shop or running errands. So it hasn't encountered any harsh or undue wear. The trouble seems to be in the ratcheting or latching mechanism. That part is made of plastic and I suppose over some time and usage it's simply wearing at the point of contact to the point where it is slipping and letting go. I don't think it is simply a dud as the belt held quite snugly when I first received it. If they could fix the little problem of it holding up my britches, I would consider buying another, but I've about had it with this one. Will be looking for a new one very soon.
summary: Long on Promise, Short on Delivery

Love this dress as it is elegant and modest.  It runs true to size and provides a flattering fit.

I received this evening dress at no cost from the manufacturer for evaluation, and here are my thoughts.

This is a lovely evening dress that fits true to size and looks just as good in person as it does in the product photos. I'm 5'8, and normally wear a size 12, so I ordered it in that size and it fit me perfectly. The cups are padded enough that I was able to skip wearing a bra, and it was cut well enough to be comfortable under the arms.

The dress did arrive very wrinkled from shipment, but I was able to smooth the fabric out with a hand held steamer. Made of 100% polyester, the dress has a satiny soft liner that feels great against the skin,  an outer later that feels like chiffon (but isn't), and a concealed zipper down the back that functions smoothly.

This is a tastefully modest dress with just a bit of see through fabric at the upper chest above the bust line and at the upper back. It drapes nicely and flows gracefully when walking, and the gorgeous sequined flowers at the waist and neck add a lovely touch of elegance.

Other than a few loose thread ends that I snipped, some of the ends of the sequined flowers weren't fully sewn down. Otherwise, the dress would be perfect. The seams are all properly aligned and neatly stitched, and the workmanship of the sequined appliques is exquisite. Overall, this dress is a very good quality and looks gorgeous.

reviewText:
Zipper broke on my existing laptop backpack so needed a new one. With high baggage fees, I tend to carry on everything onto the plane, and divide my things between my roll aboard luggage and my laptop backpack.

My search criteria: padded laptop sleeve, large capacity for traveling but still fits under the seat, good depth size for stuffing my things into it, multiple pockets for putting essential travel items and for easy access, and able to hold water bottle. This backpack fits my needs.

Pro:
-Padded laptop sleeve. The bottom of the sleeve doesn't sit on the bottom of the bag, so you won't be hitting your laptop on the ground when setting your backpack down.
-Large capacity of space for the main compartment. A very good depth too to place large items. In my picture I have a red box inside that has a depth of 5.25" that fits in there comfortably. This same box doesn't fit into my old backpack.
-The water bottle holder on the side of the bag is very tall. So bottles won't fall out when running with pack on. Can also jam lots of miscellaneous things into the mesh bag.
-Middle compartment has inside pockets for pens, cards, small things.
-Outside compartment can fit a tablet or book in there. It fits my 7" tablet. I think it'll fit a 10" one too.
-Bottom of bag has a zippered compartment where you can separately place items in. The separate compartment does share space with the main compartment of the bag.

Con:
-The flap covering for the main compartment makes it a little hard to use the zipper.
-The lining of the bottom access bag isn't very thick. I don't think it's meant to be used as extending the backpack out and making it longer, but rather is used as a separate compartment space. But if in a bind and I run out of space on my luggage and don't want to check in luggage and pay that $20 baggage fee, I have the option of pulling that extra space out and being able to stuff a couple more items in.
-My old backpack had a key clasp where I can hook my keys into without fishing around and looking for it. This one doesn't have one.

I purchased this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: good depth size for stuffing my things into it

reviewText:
I absolutely love this backpack. I purchased this bag to replace a previous gym backpack that was stolen out of my vehicle. I need a bag not to big but not to small either, this one did just right! Another thing I love is the bottom compartment of the bag. I thought it was going to just be another way to open the bag but its actually a different pocket with mess breathing vents which are perfect for storing my dirty clothes after I shower at the gym. I honestly couldn't ask for more in a bag!!

I received the product for free or at a discount but this has not influenced my review and I would purchase this bag again.

SINPAID New Casual Travel Bag Multifunction Travel Bag Outdoor Sports Bag. Very nice backpack. I purchased the red and gray one. The red is very vibrant. This is a very high quality backpack. It has several different pockets for storage, including a padded sleeve for a laptop. The fabric is very strong and waterproof, it has great stitching. The straps have thick padding so it would be very comfortable even if you have a lot of weight in it. The thing that I liked the most is that the bottom of the backpack has a zipper and when you unzip it the bottom extends another 18 inches or so. It doubles the storage space! I am using it as a hiking backpack. My girls and I are excited to get out this summer and this will hold everything that we want to bring with us. I definitely recommend to anyone needing a great quality backpack. I will update this review with pictures very soon. Disclaimer: I was provided a sample of this product in exchange for a fair, honest and thorough review. Even though I received this product at lower cost I have rated and reviewed this product without bias, based solely on my experience with it. If at any time my opinions change about this product, I will update my review accordingly.

This backpack is made with very sturdy and expensive looking materials. It is also roomy and comfortable on your back for long periods of time.  It definitely worth the price so you better get it while the price is low. What is not included in the description is that the bottom can be open and a sleeve collapse so you can place you skateboard inside for example. The lining inside is made with material that you can usually find in much more expensive backpacks like Swiss Gear. I would recommend this backpack to everyone who like to save a buck on quality products that are not brand name. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the zippers could be of better quality.
summary: Very good quality for the price

reviewText: Comfortable, and met my expectations. Very pleased with this purchase!

First, I really love that it's a non toxic product! It's also well made, seems very durable yet soft. However, I got the gray one because the reviews for the white one said it didn't block out light. I sleep with sound, but have to have a blacked out room to sleep. Even though there is an extra bit of fabric cushioning that sits on the bridge of your nose, (therefore it should block out all light)...it still let's in enough light to bother me and the gray one isn't dark (or maybe thick?) enough to block all light either. I'd guess it only blocks about 80% of light. Also, even though it fits me perfectly, it still feels like it's squeezing my eyes. I even tried wearing it loose, just tight enough to stay on. But when I wake up my eyes are very dry because the cotton was pressed firmly against them all night. I wanted this to work for me so much because there's a surprisingly short list of organic sleep wear out there for a decent price, but sadly I'll be sending this back. It could be better if it came in black (with organic dyes) and if the nose bridge cushioning was thick enough to block all light and get the mask off of the eyes enough so they can breathe.
summary: A few important upgrades and I'd give it 5 stars.

reviewText:
This eye mask is a great find. I live in an apartment building in a semi-urban area and even with blinds down, the street lights, car lights and security lights are too strong to block out. I was using a head band over my eyes which fit well but it is a synthetic material and I end up taking it off because it is too hot. So this cotton mask is perfect (I purchased the melange) - have used it only a couple of nights so far, but it definitely is helping me get a better night's sleep.  Very comfortable. Now I just have to work out a satisfactory way to block out the traffic and street noise!

Update 10/19/2016: My review still stands with one caveat. The cotton band in the back stretches out after prolonged use and there is not enough Velcro on the attaching strip to keep it tight at this point.  I have bought some Velcro to see if I can fix the problem, but my recommendation is that both Velcro strips should be equal in size.

I was so excited to get this mask, especially when I got it out of the bag and it was so soft! There are panels at the top and bottom of the mask to block sunlight, and the grey color would block out the sun. The reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because it doesn't fit my giant head. I know I have a larger head than usual (like a melon on a toothpick), but as of right now, there's not measurement on the product description to list a size. Another inch of velcro in the back, and I would have been fine. I think the mask is high enough quality that I'm going to buy the velcro and sew it on myself. For most people, this is a great buy, if you have a big noggin like mine, best to rethink.
I received a discount on this item in exchange for my fair and honest review.
summary: High quality, but doesn't fit my giant head

reviewText:
I do like this shirt, but I had some issues with it not being exactly what was pictured.

Firstly, the item description says that XS is not available, but I was still able to order an XS. When my package came in, I received a S. I'm pretty petite and I feel like a XS would have fit a little better.

The item description also says to make sure that the Ezcosplay trademark is on the shirt. This trademark is not on my shirt and the tag says "Die Die Fashion." I did not venture off the main page to different sellers when I ordered this item. Due to this and some other problems with the shirt, I'm thinking that I did not receive an authentic Ezcosplay shirt. So to future buyers, double check that you're ordering from Ezcosplay.

The physical appearance of the shirt is slightly different than the model photo. The color in the photo shows a darker green color. The actual shirt was more of a lighter olive color. I put the shirt on, and I was expecting the shirt to accentuate my waist like the model photo. Instead, I felt kind of like I was wearing a brown paper bag. I felt like this made me look larger than what I actually am. So, I put a thin belt on around my waist to show my figure. It was pretty cute with the belt, but I would have preferred it to look like the picture so I could wear it without the belt.
A huge disappointment to me was that when it arrived, it came with a hole in the front left side. I probably would have left this item 4 stars if it wasn't for the hole.

Despite a few issues with the shirt, there are still some good qualities to it. It is made from a light weight material that is super soft. The style of the shirt is pretty cute on. The cut outs on the shoulders are where they are supposed to be and it isn't to low cut. I could see me wearing this shirt with blue jeans or jean shorts. Overall, it's an okay shirt if you can look past a few errors, which I can.

*I was given this shirt at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

reviewText: These are very nice and shiny, seem high-end and good value. Can even be a great gift option for someone's birthday. The design and delicate- looking is classy and they would match any outfit. So far we have no problems and I hope in the long run (since we do not take our earrings off every day) they will not irritate the ears and hope the shine doesn't rub off and the clasps don't go loose... if any of that happens I will update my review. I really like these kind of small loops earrings but often these kinds of clasps undo and easy to lose earrings (especially true for active kids). I have attached pictures of my child (light hair) wearing these earrings and also a photo of myself wearing them. They are on the larger side for kids but still very nice... they may be more suitable for teens I think. But they also look nice on me I think since they are not too small and not too large for an adult to wear also. Also I have noticed that on the amazon description it says they are "Girls" but on the label shipped to me (as on the third picture I attached it says "Womens"). They ship in that black velvety pouch, as pictured. I had received this product at a slight discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. So I do hope you find my review helpful in your purchasing decisions.
