This is a single piece, that might not be crystal clear from the product shots but everything is essentially linked together by some other component so the top and bottom are not items you could separate without actually cutting the product.  Came packaged rather plainly in just a clear plastic wrap but thats not a-typical for products of this sort at this price point but it was not discreetly packaged if that matters or is a concern to you.  The top is a bit more forgiving because you can adjust the straps and ties to accommodate your particular figure and bust.  The area that might be trouble for some folks is the skirt which if you are to one end or the other of the size range you might find a little bit too big or a bit snug.  My wife say she is between a 6 and a 7 depending on the outfit and she found the skirt a bit snug but it still fit.  So something to bear in mind but that true of any "one size fits all" or "one size fits most" type of garment.  For the price we found it well made and found no issues with the garment itself!

Product was purchased with my own funds but the seller did provide a promotional discount in exchange for agreeing to share my opinion and thoughts on the product.  No other compensation or consideration was exchanged nor did the seller have any input on the content of my write up!  I hope you find the rambling on about my experience helpful in your purchasing evaluation and I always do appreciate a helpful vote if you are so inclined!

reviewText: Worked perfect, but could use a magnifying glass with the kit.
I used to replace the batteries. The quality of the instrument is below average. The price confirms the quality.

I purchased this from my wifes account and am reviewing it under mine, so I may not get the verified purchaser label, but I am including several pictures so that you can see I did indeed purchase it.

I was very disappointed with the quality of this tool kit. I didn't expect much of it at this price point, but I expected everything to at least work but possibly break under too much pressure.

First off, the screwdrivers. This set came with three precision screwdrivers. I pulled one out to unscrew the back of my Casio watch and couldn't turn the screw. At first I thought maybe the screw was stripped, but then I realized the screwdriver tip was just spinning in the shaft of the screwdriver. I grabbed the tip and gently pulled it, and it came right out. I pulled the other two screwdrivers out to test them. I was able to remove the tips from both with one hand by holding the screwdriver with three fingers and using my thumb and index finger to pull up on the tips. Thats how loose they were. Needless to say, the screwdrivers were not functional right out of the box.

Secondly, one of the holes on the wrench that you are supposed to attach a tip to is either too small or not threaded correctly because I was not able to screw the tip in. Luckily, I was able to use it with only two tips to open up my screw-back case watches.

Third, the hammer is too long for the case. Its as if they just tossed a random hammer in that wasn't even made for the tool set. You will notice in my pictures that it is longer than the inside of the case and that when zipped up it cannot be completely closed and protrudes from the case. In fact, they had tried so hard to fit the hammer in for shipping that the zipper was pulled apart from being stretched where it was supposed to have been zipped. I had to force the zipper pull over the open section so that I could then zip it up properly.

Finally, the small plastic bag that holds the bracelet pins was ripped open and there were loose pins in the kit. The plastic was extremely thin, so it probably could have ripped from someone sneezing on it (an exaggeration but you get the point).

Im giving this 2 stars because the wrench was at least able to do what I needed it to do and the pry knife and pry tool seem to work well. I have not had to use any of the other parts yet. To have this many quality issues right from the start is very disappointing, though. Im not going to bother to return it because the pieces that I need do what I need them to do, and I already own a good quality precision screwdriver kit. I would not recommend this to anyone as a purchase, though.
summary: Several quality issues right off the bat

reviewText: This bag is awesome! I got this for work because of the leather and they way I know it will stand the test of time. Generally the stitching will be the first to go in these type bags but the leather will last as long as you take care of it. I was surprised at how well made this bag is. The stitching is thick and I have no doubt it will hold up over time. The pockets are a nice addition as well as the inner separator to keep things from banging into your laptop. Now it did fit my 15.5 laptop just fine. It was a little snug but I have a case on mine too. So I expected it to be. I have provided a video and I encourage you to watch it to see my full review. I am giving this a very very high 5 star review. Its an amazing laptop bag or a briefcase bag in general. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask in the comments. I will respond. If you found my review helpful, let me know. Lets keep making better buying decisions together. Thank you and as always Be Safe & Happy Shopping!! I received a sample product to test and evaluate and give my unbiased feedback to you. If anything changes during my usage, I will update my review.

reviewText: Great set at good price

I bought this with the intention of fixing my own watches ( most of which are about 32mm however; I did find myself wishing I had small sizes( seeing as how a buddy's watch also needed fixing) or just the 32mm bars but I just couldn't beat this price. These spring bars are durable, robust, and have certainly stood the test of time (which for me is a little over 6 months). I also found my self wishing that this product came with a spring bar tool but, with patience and a little maneuvering, they should install quite nicely. If you at a watch collector like myself, you should find that this product is well made and fairly priced. Only, I would recommend using a spring bar tool if you don't already have one.

My guy drools a lot of milk onto me and i get milk on them every time. I felt nasty only having two so I started testing out more. Ones with wire, ones without and ones with padding. But to get to this bra I like it. It doesn't have any wire which I love. It does have padding which I normally don't care for but this one isn't bad and of course I could take out the pads (it has a little slit for that). Its so soft and comfy and I don't feel like i'm even wearing a bra. Has plenty of stretch if you get engorged and "grow". I wear a 34C and the small fits great for me. It does set off the shoulders a bit but that doesn't bother me.

reviewText:
Lately I've gotten really interested in the NuGoth look. (With apologies to our central pillar of traditionalists, I love everything from old school goth to cybergoth, and the NuGoth twist we're seeing in the last couple of years is just the best, most versatile, casual yet polished variation of goth fashion in at least a decade.) This bag absolutely epitomizes that look, with the combination of geometry, esoteric/occult symbols, and striking, white graphics.

It's faux/vegan leather and feels quite durable. The strap is a strong woven material, and it's both removable and adjustable from cross-body to shoulder. There's a single handle if you prefer to carry it like a case. The size is generous but not ridiculous. I can fit everything from my Big Purse in this one once I remove the organizers I usually use. There's a back pocket (just a little too small for most phones, sadly) and a little organization inside, but mostly this is a toss-it-all-in-the-middle sort of purse. (And obviously the shape doesn't work well with removable organizers.) It opens across the top about, oh, forty percent of the bag's overall circumference, so it's easy to access your contents.

So the shape and the organization might be a touch challenging, but overall this is a very useful, practical purse that would go well with just about any goth look, especially NuGoth. It's a bit oversized for a club purse, but if you've got the confidence, this could easily be your everyday handbag.

I bought this dress for my daughters dance performance. They had to wear street clothes for this particular dance. The fabric has a little bit of stretch to it which is nice. She is 5'7" and it hits her about her knees. It is an attractive dress.

I had read reviews stating that the dress runs a bit large. I was glad I listened and ordered a size down. The XS fits me (5'5", 115lb) perfectly. The material is stretchy, and the dress is beautiful.

I was interested in this dress for a wedding (bridesmaid), and while the length and waist fit nicely, the bust was too large for me. Because of the style of the bust area, it would have been pretty difficult to have it altered (and probably expensive, too), so I ended up returning it. The size chart included a range of measurements, so it was difficult to tell if it would fit (my measurements fell on the smaller end/middle). According to the tag on the dress, the XS is equivalent to a US size 4; had I known that, I would've known it would be too big! A nice dress, but it might not work if you have a 32A/34A or smaller bra size.
summary: and while the length and waist fit nicely, the bust was too large for me

PROS:
~lacy
~flared arms
~rich, black color

CONS:
~tight in the chest
~loose threads
~short for a dress / long for a shirt

My pictures, unfortunately, do not do it justice, so I included the website picture.  There were a lot of loose threads around the flared arms that were easily trimmed off.  It's kind of like they were in a hurry and forgot to do the finishing work.  I usually order an XL due to the size of my chest, and this dress did not come in that size.  I guess I was hoping it would stretch enough.  It is not the seller's fault I ordered it in the wrong size.

In short, great jacket, amazing price, and even better value

I bought this bag to take with me when I help my kids classes on field trips. Recently we went to a nearby farm to pick vegetables as a field trip and I took along the Vera Bradley  large lighten up campus two backpack. I have four kids and normally that bag is perfect. Well this time I was only going with one of my kids so I just needed a bag to hold my wallet, keys, cell, and a lunch and bottle of water. Well that bag was way too big and I felt silly carrying it. Soooo, I did some research and found this size Vera backpack. It looked exactly what I needed for those light day trips.  I love Vera bags because of the excellent quality. I own several, and have never once had a problem with zippers, construction, or fabric ripping on me.
This bag is bigger than I expected. It's quilted and padded and comes with adjustable straps. There is a magnetic closure on the front with two slip pockets underneath and one large slip pocket behind that. There is a zip pocket in the back and another one in the inside. A large pocket and ID slot under the flap in the front. When the base of the bag is folded out its pretty wide. I could easily fit my lunch, a couple bottles of water and my small all in one crossbody wallet, along with an iPhone six plus and both of the cosmetic cases fully loaded. I also love that it's got a padded rolled handle on the top for hanging or to easily grab. This bag could very easily fit under a seat on a plane with it crammed full to the max. It's also got two slip pockets on the sides for keys etc. I didn't  think a regular plastic water bottle will fit into those pockets, but was able to squeeze one in. And also on the other side I squeezed in a small Starbucks frappecino bottle. Just to see if they would fit. They do, but you won't be able to easily get either one out and back in again while having it on your back. I wish the two side pockets were a smidge bigger with elastic on the top like they are on the larger campus backpacks. I also bought the matching set of two cosmetic bags in the same Catalina blues print to use with this bag, and love them! I could put small snacks (granola bars etc) in the larger clear cosmetic, and use the smaller in the bag for my mommy stuff. I have enclosed photos with these two additional bad for reference and sizing. Colors are bright, vibrant, and you can wash it in the machine as long as you hang it to dry. Since I got mine in Catalina blues the coordinating pattern on the inside is in Catalina showers. The full retail price of this bag is $88. That is not what I paid.  Think I'm really going to enjoy this bag!
summary: Beautiful bag, great construction. awesome quality!

reviewText: I ordered this dress for an adult prom that my husband and I attended and it arrived in a timely fashion and in great shape. There were no visible defects and the material seemed sturdy and not cheap. I am 55, 36C, and measure 36-30-40 so I was very concerned that I would be too hippy to pull this off. I ordered a small based on other reviews and prayed like hell I didn't screw up. It actually fit exactly how I wanted it to (Jessica Rabbit-esque, if you will) but it was probably a good foot too long. I realize it is supposed to have that train effect but even still this dress was just ridiculously long. Luckily I have a good seamstress who was able to shorten it and it looked absolutely beautiful in the end. I did add a red sash and a blingy brooch because I wanted something to break it up a little and I really didn't like the placement of the seam connecting the top to the bottom. Otherwise, I was pleased with my purchase and will consider using this same seller next year for prom.

First of all, the jacket arrived about a month earlier than the original estimated delivery date so that's a big plus in my book.

 As for the size and fit, it fits just fine. At 5'8, I generally have to buy my shirts/jackets in a size Small. According to the sizing chart, a U.S. Small is the equivalent of a Chinese Medium; so that's what I ordered. However, the jacket I received has an 'L' (presumably for 'Large') on the label. I assumed there had been a mistake but the jacket fits perfectly. If there was a mistake, it seems to have worked out in my favor.

 Having only just received the jacket, I can't really comment much on the quality. I suppose time will tell how well it holds up. The truth is I ordered the jacket for the purposes of cosplay (specifically Star Lord from Guardians of the Galaxy).

The one complaint I have would be that, due to the way it was packaged, the jacket was very wrinkled when I opened it. Otherwise, I'm very pleased w/ the product I received.

Fortunately, I'm a man of fashion and I know high-class when I see it. That's why I love this tie, the quality, the cut, and the straight up awesomeness are on a level that I haven't seen in a men's tie in years. Please, do your wardrobe a favor and buy this tie. reviewText:
I really wanted to like these shoe lights. It really is a good concept and would be so perfect for running or walking at night or early morning if they would only stay on my shoes! I have worn these shoe clips for two mornings now. I clip them to the back of my shoes and they stay on for about 15 minutes, then they pop right off. The past  two mornings during mid run, the clips flew off my shoes and dashed across the street. This morning it happened right as a car was coming by and the car's tire narrowly missed the shoe light that went flying across the street. I have tried putting these clips on my shoes every way possible and I can not seem to keep them on my shoes. I ended up clipping them to the back of my waist band while I finished my run.

Like I said above, these shoes lights are a good concept. I like the bright green light that can be seen from pretty far away. The button to turn the light on is easy to use and they are made of heavy duty plastic so when they hit the pavement they will not break. I know this from experience. If I continue to use these lights I will probably keep them clipped on my waist band.

***DISCLAIMER*** I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: I like the concept but won't stay on my shoes!

reviewText:
I love to run and live in the country.  This means dealing with dirt road traffic, which can be very fast.  Sometimes people don't see me until the last second even though I wear bright colors.  I have been thinking of buying shoe lights for awhile and was excited to give these a try.  They arrived quickly and I immediately unpacked them and snapped on my shoes.  First I made the mistake of clipping them on my shoes before I put my feet in and they slipped off.  Then I correctly put my shoes on and clipped the lights on second.  This worked much better and resulted in them staying in place.  They even stayed in place during my entire run.  They didn't appear to have moved by the running motion, either.  The large green button you can see in the product photo is a toggle button to turn on constant/turn on flashing/turn off.  I included a few photos of my pair.  (Couldn't get anyone to run behind me so you could see these in action, though!)  They are very bright and I believe a driver could see me from a good distance away--or at least understand something with flashing lights is moving ahead of them.  Of course, with these on the backs of my shoes, this won't help the crazy drivers in front of me, just behind me.  I hope the batteries last for quite awhile. Overall, I am extremely happy with this purchase!  I highly recommend.

Please note that this product was provided to me at a discount for my honest opinion.  This statement used to bother me before I reviewed products myself andI came to understand that reviewers are allowed to give a good or bad review, as long as it is honest.  I am not afraid to tell you about my experience and really am happy with this product.
summary: Great visibility; enjoyed options of constant and flashing green lights

reviewText: bright, eye catching glow from the shoe lights. It's getting light later, so I don't know how long the battery life will be!

I heard about this bra after the Shark Tank episode aired, and my mother contacted me about it. I'm a lifelong athlete and I've been strapping these boobs down for athletic pursuits for about 23 of my years, so I am constantly on the hunt for the perfect sports bra. This is NOT IT. I wanted to love it, I really did. I ignored the red flags: None of the marketing ads showed women actually doing anything bouncy, all the women in the ads appeared to have breast implants (which is great, but totally changes what they need from a sports bra), and it appeared to have several of the problems I've encountered previously, which I will detail below. I ordered anyway, and I should have listened to myself. My current activities include running (bouncy), Jazzercise (super bouncy), cycling (less bouncy), and Crossfit (intermittently bouncy).

1) Sizing: Women with large breasts on a comparably much smaller frame know that you need cup sizing in anything, including sports bras. Without cup sizing, it's always the same: if it fits my boobs, the band is too large. If the band fits, my boobs look like they're being squeezed out all around the bra like Silly Putty. So the idea of an adjustable band seemed like a great way to overcome this. I was on the cusp of two sizes, so I ordered the smaller one. I have the band as tight as it will go - no velcro left to go tighter - so I know I couldn't go up a size. The cups seem just a bit small, which means less bounce control.

2) Bounce control: I was concerned when looking at the bra online that there is a lot of cleavage, which means there is not much coverage on top. That's fine if your breasts are mostly implants that are held down by the pectoral muscles, but natural boob-slingers know that they bounce up every bit as much as they bounce down. Well, I was right. There is little to nothing to keep upward bounce under wraps. SHEfit has fallen into the same trap many sports bras fall into: they rely heavily on shoulder straps to control bounce. When the straps are in H-back, we're talking pure earthquake-simulating chaos. Worse than my regular non-sports bras. When it's in X-back, I can get some decent control if I tighten the straps enough. But the straps are narrow, so it doesn't take long before they are cutting into my traps. So then I get to choose between tit-sloshing and bruised traps. I could not wait to get out of this thing after my workouts.

3) Comfort: I've already addressed the miserable discomfort involved in controlling bounce, so here's what I have to say about general comfort. The base/band and cups of this bra are substantial. It's like wearing a "device," not a bra. Which I would be fine with, if it worked. Just know it feels bulky and looks weird under clothes - the adjustable band sticks out under a shirt and so does the front zipper, creating a weird lump at the top of your cleavage. The band and straps adjust with a hook & loop closure, and no matter how I adjusted it the scratchy part kept finding its way to my skin. I ended my workouts with my shirt stuffed up under the band where the scratchy part was.

4) Other: And speaking of the zipper... When I tried to wear the bra in H-back, the zipper lasted about ten seconds and then shot down to the bottom, releasing my tatas like floodwaters. I tried again, with the same result.

This thing was touted to be a game-changer in the world of sports bras for large-breasted women. It is not. At all. They've made all the same mistakes their predecessors have, and the few areas of innovation are done inelegantly and ineffectively.

I love this tunic so, so much!!  It looks exactly like it does in the picture.  I bought the light grey one with the trees, I'm 5'4" and 119 lbs. and the "one size" fits perfectly.  The gathering at the sides on the bottom keeps it from looking boxy; it's a little hard to see from the picture but it just pulls the material slightly in so that it lightly grazes your leg and gives the garment shape.  Since the tunic is only offered in one size, I can see how this might not be the most flattering cut on fuller figures as other people have pointed out, but for people who wear size small and medium, I think you will be pleased with the fit.  The best thing about the tunic is the fabric; it is soft and cozy and washes well, I've washed it twice so far and it still retained its softness and none of the rhinestones fell off.

reviewText:
You don't get the picture you specify!  I wanted a deep blue nebula--would go with the clothes I planned to wear with it.  I got the image of a galaxy: there's still enough color to make it fit the outfit, but now it's much less subtle of an image than I was wanting.  I'll keep it, but I thought you all should know about that.

Also, this is one of those products that ships directly from China, so the wait can be long.

Finally, do pay attention to the image: the metal is a brass, or looks like brass. Fairly dull--would work well with steampunk inspired outfits, anything in the olive greens or old school camouflage colors.  The brass does make the blue color look even more vibrant.  But if your outfits won't work with a brass colored chain, then don't get this.

The folks at Blooming Jelly were kind enough to provide me with this black, large plus, Women's Long Hollow Out Fashion Top in exchange for sharing my unbiased review...

First off, these are not plus size tops so the sizing / description should be updated. For reference, I'm 5'2, 32C bust, and wear a women's size 6, curvy and pear shaped.

It arrived as advertised and washes up nicely. It is listed to be a Polyester, Cotton, Microfiber, Spandex blend but has no tags to verify. It is soft with some stretch. I washed it cold, in a lingerie wash bag, and hung dry. Didn't experience any fading, pilling, or shrinking.

I was surprised when I opened it because, considering it's low price, I thought it looked nicer than online and would be super flattering! I think on most women, it might be...

I ordered it according to the sizing in the product description. I normally wear a women's size Small top and accordingly ordered this in a size Large.

The top fit nicely across my upper body (maybe not made for broad shoulders), although a little short in front, ending right where my pants start. It's not at all slim cut below the bust so it's not flattering if you want to show a small waistline. Maybe great on someone with smaller hips but not great on me...

It just seemed a bit too wide on the lower half to look good with my shape. If I'd gone a size smaller, it definitely would not have fit around the neckline or arm holes as this one fit snugly in those areas.

I rated this 4 stars because it appears to be well made, I love the unique design, and there are no loose seams. I think it'd be super cute with shorts or a little skirt but it's not good (on me) with pants.

Adding photos to reflect how it looks solid but is slightly sheer in the light. It's not see through but in a photo with flash would most likely turn out with undergarments revealed.

Would recommend this shirt to others depending on their height and shape. Smile. I will update this review down the road should it not hold up well. Hope this is helpful!
summary: Gorgeous Top, A Bit Too A-line For Me...... See Photos~

I have a tailor who also may be able to make the transition less boxy. I'd say this dress would work well for someone less pear shaped, but I'd definitely size up.

It fit more like a size 4 and it was white instead of ivory. I emailed customer service and they promptly handled my grieveance. I am waiting on a new customized dress to be shipped. It helps to send exact measurements and pictures of anything extra you want done (which is free). In the event that it doesn't fit, customer service will work with you to ensure you are satisfied.

***UPDATE 4/27/2016****

I received my new dress today and I am sooooo pleased with it!!! It fits perfectly! I asked for the back to be altered. I sent a picture of how I wanted the back and they nailed it!!! I am very happy with my purchase. It has a good materials quality, the color is perfect and the size also. This backpacked a lot of compliments! The only minor issue is the hanger of the zipper. The fall off easily.

BUYER BEWARE. Almost all of the 5 star reviews for this bag are from people who have received it for free in exchange for a good review. I bought it with no discount. My review is unbiased as I paid full priced and was swooned into purchasing this awful thing.  That being said, I liked this backpack when it first arrived. It had that under the radar sleek vibe I was looking for. It was a bit small but I was willing to look past that because it seemed functional enough. However, my opinion of this POS bag they try to pass off as a quality backpack came to a crashing halt after the third day of owning it. The front Middle zipper broke with absolutely nothing in that pocket. It simply would not zipper up and remain secured. The structural integrity of the zipping device failed.  You get the point.  Indeed a cool looking bag both online and in person, yet the most important part of the pack, the zippers, are of THE WORST quality. Not worth buying for any amount of money. Since these guys care so much about their reviews and pretty much pay people for good reviews I will offer them this proposal. I want a full return with my shipping costs covered as well and I will take my TRUE honest and unbiased opinion or your awful backpack.
UPDATE: There was no refund but they did send me a new bag free of charge. And guess what happened, again, THE ZIPPER BROKE. This time it was after one use and it was the main compartment! The pictures tell the story. Do not buy this bag for any amount of money. I wouldn't even want it for free.

As a nursing student I am always on the go and always studying so there are certain things that I need to make sure are made well. One of those things is my backpacks. With all the books and equipment that I transport on a daily basis its important to have something that is going last me for a while and protect the things that I have in my bag. My books are worth way into the 600.00 range and the MacBook that I have at all times is a 1800.00 machine so I take what I have these expensive things in rather important. I have carried a lot of bags in my college career anything from regular big box store cheaper backpack and then name brand pack that cost me a pretty penny and not only do I think that this back pack met the expectations but also exceeded them in many areas. One of the places in which this backpack surpasses most pack is the quality of the pack itself. The material is very thick and made very well. The stitching on the pack is great and there was not a single loose thread on the whole bag. This bag has a lot of great little pockets and places that are built into the bag itself bit by far my favorite is the place that is able to hold my computer. Not only is big enough to hold my 12in computer but the back of the backpack is nice and padded so I don't have to worry about my laptop getting damaged in the pocket of the bag. The front pocket on the bag is nice and deep so that you can fit a lot of things in there. I have put in my stethoscope in there when there is nothing else in there and it fit it just right. There are also 2 great side pockets that are a perfect fit for a couple standard water bottles. There is also a couple pockets on the inside that are great for a cell phone or even a smaller wallet. The pocket on the very inside of the pack I have used for my keys or even spare change cause its big enough that its easy to reach into but small enough where it doesnt get in the way. Overall this is a great pack. Not only do the pockets in it make it very versatile and able to be used for not only school but as I did recently and took it on a hike. The material that its made of makes it nice and easy to wash. This is by far my favorite bag that I have owned yet. I received this product for free in exchange for my true and unbiased opinion. The opinions expressed in this review are mine and mine alone. No one or nothing has influenced my opinion. I in no way shape or form have a relationship with this dealer.
so cool, if you're thinking about it, buy it!

I had been using a diaper bag backpack for 2 years and it was quite heavy, even empty! So I started searching for a new backpack and came across this one. I love it. So I have 2 girls and wanted  something neutral and comfortable. This backpack is so roomy! It has 2 side pockets to hold drinks, 2 zipper outer pockets where I keep the plastic bags to toss out dirty diapers. The other one I keep a nursing cover and small blankets for drooling. The big part of the backpack has 1 medium size zipper pocket and I keep my wallet & keys. It also had 2 other small pockets.

The straps are thick and wide. So with all stuff I carry, the weight is evenly distributed. I love the color because its easy to clean and even if it gets dirty, you really can't tell. The zippers have leather tabs that help you pull to zip or unzip. It's not water proof! The canvas gets wet and soaks up the liquid, but the inside lining feels a suoer ligjt damp, not enough to get anything wet.

The canvas is think and flexible. It has nice stitching detail and looks very simple. To me , less is more! The back side of the backpack is nicely padded, great if you carry a laptop or tablet. I highly recommended it. I wish I would have spend the $40 I paid for the diaper bag on this regular backpack.
Really liked this bag but thought it was shoulder bag  It works

The Ibagbar Men's Canvas Shoulders Backpack Student Bag is a very well made, high quality backpack.  All of the stitching inside and out on the backpack is uniform and tight. I have not noticed any loose threads or loose seams.  The fabric is a nice sturdy cotton canvas with a reasonable thickness to be able to support a substantial amount of books or other items without bursting the seams out. The adjustable straps are 3 inches wide & the edges are finished with binding material. The zippers are very high quality & zip and unzip easily.

The inside of the bag is fully lined. Inside the main compartment, there is 5 Deep by 8 Wide Zippered pocket on the back wall. Under that, there is a large 6.5 Deep by 10 Wide pouch with an elastic band across the back to help hold items inside. On the inside of the front flap are two 4 Deep open top pockets. On the outer side of the main flap is a 10 Deep by 9 Wide zippered pocket with another smaller 6 Deep by 8.5 Wide pocket on layered top of it. All in all, this is a generously sized, well-constructed backpack that should serve its purpose well for many years to come.  I received this product at no cost in exchange for this review. All statements made in this review in regard to this product, represent my own genuine and honest opinions.
summary: This is a Generously Sized, Well-Constructed Backpack that Looks Great, Too!

reviewText:
This backpack is amazing. Originally, I purchased it for myself because I am in college classes and those books get heavy. As I was waiting for it to arrive, my son brought me his backpack and showed me that the straps were almost ripped off at the shoulders.. He only carries like 2 binders in it, and it has ripped!?!? Geez!! When this one did arrive, I gave it to him. Before giving it to him, I did check it out. It is fabulous! The canvas material is so sturdy and durable! I absolutely love the quality with which this bag is made. The bag came in another bag like higher end purses. The leather tag was authentic as far as I could tell. I am in love with it and I will be purchasing one for myself!! I am including a copy of the product description so that you may see what I saw when I purchased this item.

Imported
Cotton lining
Main material: This backpack is made of 95% high density cotton canvas and 5% genuine leather zips, it's very durable.
Structure: A total of 9 pockets. 1 main zipper Pocket, 2 sides pockets, 2 front zipped pockets, 1 inner zipper Pocket, 1 Laptop compartment pocket and 2 open inner pockets.
Approx Dimensions: 11.5" L x 17.5" H x 7.5"W Capacity: 24.24L ( fits up to 15" Laptop, ipad/kindle. )
Adjustable padded shoulder straps to protect your shoulder, you can adjust it according to your height and comfort requirements. Shoulder strap length and wide: 36.6" L x 2.8"W.
Ibagbar: It's an classic designed backpack that you will receive many compliments from your family and friends.

I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an unbiased review.

I was in the market for a nice backpack for me to take to school, but could also use for hikes, and other outdoor activities. I found this backpack, and I have been loving it so far, the size although not the biggest, is definitely suitable for most occasions, and can carry all the books and notebooks you need.

It has a main compartment, along with the two smaller pockets all of which are very nicely insulated to keep the inside a little more protected from things such as rain, the backpack also contains two side pockets that can carry a water bottle with a snug fit, but doesn't have much room to wiggle. The zippers and other leather parts are made of nice material and doesn't look like they will fall apart within a month.

I really like the main compartment which has little sleeves to hold things like cash, electronics, and your wallet. It also contains a small zipper pocket inside the main pocket to hold you pencils, and such. The bottom of the bag has this support on the bottom to maintain its shape a little better, so it makes it easier to to put in your books, notebooks, and papers.

Overall, its a really nice backpack for the same, and even a little cheaper than other backpacks from big companies such as Jansport. If you're looking for a nice backpack for next semester or school year, then this one is a great choice!
Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

I bought them for my wife to sleep in, so the length isn't an issue for her, but I definitely would not recommend wearing them out in public unless you are alright with someone seeing your butt with every step. Due to some of the reviews, I ordered a size up, and they actually ended up being a bit too big on my wife, so next time I'll make sure to order a medium instead of a large.

She's had them for a few months now, and wears them at least once a week, and they are holding up great even after being put into a washer and dryer multiple times. They are still a vivid coral color, very soft and comfy, and the lace / scalloping hasn't torn at all. Would definitely buy them again for such a good price!
summary: but I definitely would not recommend wearing them out in public unless you are alright ...

reviewText: My experience is nothing like the reviews! I usually wear a medium. After reading the reviews, I ordered up two sizes and got an XL and that XL fit just like any other XL would and the shorts are way too big on me. Based on how these shorts fit, a medium would be the perfect size for me, which is the size I always wear! So, my experience is that these are true to size. I'm just going to do a little DIY alteration and keep this pair but I've already ordered another pair in size medium. These are adorable shorts and look great dressed up with a Lacey camisole, a pair of wedge sandals and some jewelry. Adorable! They are an appropriate length, too - which I love! It's so hard to find cute shorts that aren't hoochie-length!
summary: True to size! Adorable shorts - great for casual or dressy!

I had been using Nike Free runs for over 2 years and it was high time that i got a new pair of running shoes. I was ready to buy a new pair of free's until I stumbled upon these shows on amazon and fell in love. I have slightly small feet so I am down to buying kids sizes since they cost much less than adult sizes. So I decided to give the new boost foam shoes a try and this is my review:
_________

DESIGN: What can I say about these shoes. They are definitely a looker. The brilliant electric blue color along with the the well accented black and white really do catch your eyes and the eyes of others as well. I have no complaints about the design. I love the blue and they will be the envy of other runners in the track.
__________

COMFORT: These are a bit heavier and more restricted in movement than my Free Runs but the flexible upper helps in increasing flexibility even though its not a minimalist shoe. This shoe is more of a hybrid between a minimalist and stability shoe. The ankle area is a but tight for me but I am easily adjusting to them. My biggest complaint as far as comfort goes is that they do end up getting hot in the long runs. Please be aware of this.
___________

CUSHIONING and PERFORMANCE: The boost foam is remarkably pleasant. It really does feel like memory foam for your feet but as far as making my runs more effective, I found no difference between these and my Free Runs which means the performance is great and definitely worth the price that they are being sold for. And the cushioning of course is phenomenal.
____________

CONCLUSION: I love these shoes and recommend these if you are considering them. Give them a try.

reviewText: This wig will be my part of my husbands costume for Halloween this year! He can't wait to be Mr. Donald Trump! He has already tried the wig on & we love it! My teenage kids have been having a ball trying it on & taking selfies. The wig is a good quality wig. Comes with a protective hair net around it so it stays neat looking before it gets to its wearer. It is more of an orange color than a blonde color. Fits a bit tight unless you have a head on the smaller side. I tried to get it on with no luck, but I have a ton of thick hair that was tied up underneath. My husband is bald, has a smaller head & it fits him perfectly. There are no bald spots in this wig & the hair is proportioned just right. The wig has more of a curl to it than is pictured, but if you just take a comb & give it more of that TRUMP "comb-over" look...slap on a suit & curl your lips, you'll be a dead ringer LOL. My kids are daring my husband to dress the part & wear this wig on election day when we go to the polls & be THE DONALD for the day!! :). I received this @no cost in exchange for my honest opinion.
summary: good quality wig....be THE DONALD for the day....

reviewText: Unfortunately this wig was not big enough for me to wear (I have too much hair of my own to be able to hide it underneath this wig), but I think it will be perfect for a man to wear. It is slightly more orange in color than I expected, and frankly better looking than Trump's real hair. Will people realize that you are trying to copy Trump? Not sure, but who cares. Put it on, yell "you're fired!", and people will get the drift. Fun for Halloween, costume parties or when you are truly ready to fire that special someone in your life. Wig received to test with the option to review. No financial compensation is EVER accepted, and vendor may request that item be returned. I reserve 4 and 5 star ratings for products I would either recommend to others or buy for myself. This is a great product that I would highly recommend.

My apologies to the manufacturers, I'm sure they didn't mean to demoralize an entire culture of people with their simple, "sexy" costume. Costumes alike these "Arabian" variety are an example of cultural appropriation. You could sum that up to costumes like these being considered ill-humored and racist in origin. There is nothing intentionally "sexy" about Arabian culture, including traditional belly-dancing, which is considered an art and not some cheap flaunting of sexuality. Middle-Eastern culture does not deserve to be portrayed in such a manner, perhaps we could concoct less offensive costumes in the future? I understand that not many manufacturers are aware of this underlying issue, but please, act on it.

The folks at Moworve were kind enough to provide me with this watch screwdriver set in exchange for sharing my unbiased review...

I love the idea of this set and the rotating stand but unfortunately, that's about it. The blades are like bits that screw in but don't stabilize so when you go to use them, they spin unless you hold them by the blade.

The stand is labeled by size but the screwdrivers are labeled by color and there is no information included as to how the two correlate. I guesstimated which was which based on comparison from smallest to largest and they fit into the stand okay but some not sturdily.

I tried using the set to remove some watch links but found that even the smallest one (shaped like a flathead) wasn't small enough. Many watches require something more like a pick to push out the pins.

Both the blades and the replacement blades are leaning towards a black color that looks like they're beginning to rust. One of mine were delivered slightly bent making it useless.

If the blades were good, I might overlook some of the other issues but they are key in the functionality of these tools ever being useful and pretty much junk. Dissapointing.

Uploading some photos so you can get a closer look and see what I mean. Hope this is helpful!

reviewText: Beautiful dress, but zipper was broken when it arrived. I didn't have time to wait for another to ship. Verrrry long though.
Not like the photo. Very sparkly and full of sequins.

Update: The brand got in contact with me, and as it turns out, I received a recalled dress. They generously offered to send me an updated version of the dress, and I decided to take another look. I'm attaching a picture of the new dress in Navy so you can compare with the old design and see the issue I had a problem with was fixed.

I said right from the beginning that this would have been a five star dress were it not for the zipper, and I absolutely stand by that now that I have that product in hand. Although it's not the color I originally wanted - black - the navy blue looks amazing on me, is incredibly comfy, and most importantly, looks great. I threw it on over gym shorts and my husband walked by and said it looked fantastic. It's a great look for the office - sharp and sleek, perfect for a meeting - and that's exactly what it will be my go to for. If I need to present something important, this is going to be the dress of choice for me.

I have a lot of respect for anyone willing to admit they made a mistake and find a way to make up for it. The fact that the people at Ariana James admitted the zippered version of the dress was under recall immediately and offering to send an updated version to replace it very much impressed me. More importantly, they listened to feedback from reviews and fixed the problem in the dress design. That is something I can respect in any brand, and with that kind of responsiveness and willingness to listen, I am sure they will go far.

As it was explained to me, the colors that have been fully updated with the zipperless design are navy, green, and nude. Although the black has been updated, due to inventory issues, it's impossible to guarantee at this time that if you order a black dress that it will come in the updated design. In light of that, I still can't recommend the black version of this dress wholeheartedly. Still, if you decide to chance it, I think they will be reasonable with you (as they were with me) and try to work with you to get the updated version. If you decide to go this route, leave a couple of extra days in case you get the older version too.

I'm leaving the original review intact below for anyone who is considering ordering this in black, so you're aware of what a recalled dress looks like. That said, the people behind this brand are reasonable and have attempted to recall the zippered version of this dress as best they can. If you do end up with a zippered dress, get in contact with them and see what they can do to help you. Based on this interaction and the updated version of the dress I received which fixed the zipper issue, I would still recommend this product despite the rocky start. The final product that I got - even with the journey around it - remains well worth the advertised price.

--

This is KILLING me. I want to love this dress. It should be a great dress. It is comfortable and soft and falls a little longer on me - just above the knee, absolutely perfect! - and then I feel this weirdness on my left upper thigh and realize the dress is poking out there like some sort of awful arrowhead. Is it on the other side? Nope. Just the left. My left thigh looks like it could kill someone.

Yes, the thigh. It is exactly as weird looking as it sounds.

It fits perfectly, but I could murder someone with my thigh corner.

It is soft and cute except for that one corner on my thigh where it is stiff and weird.

The fabric has just enough give, like a t-shirt, to hug all my curves, except in the thigh corner where life is not curvy, but instead very pointy.

I could totally wear this to the office and maybe rock this thigh corner as some sort of power move if there were two of them, but as it turns out there is only one thigh corner, and that's like wearing one shoulder pad.

At first I thought that perhaps this was a weird pocket placement issue, but I didn't find any pockets. I thought it must be poor sewing, but that was fine too. Once I realized it wasn't even symetrical I was sure it must be a manufacturing mistake. And only then - after taking the dress on and off several times with ease - that the left side has a zipper, and the difference in fabric stiffness between the shirt like material and the zipper backing was the issue.

This is the least necessary zipper in the history of zippers, including every zipper on every pair of pants that were sold at Hot Topic in the early 2000s. I can't stress enough how much I never needed or wanted this zipper with this fabric. A side zipper makes sense when you have fabric with very little give and you want a tailored fit. It is not just unnecessary, but actively detrimental on this dress. There were so many other options here - leave the zipper off entirely, put it in the back where things are nice and flat and you're not worrying about curves, choose a fabric with more body to it - and somehow I ended up with the worst possible design, an asymmetrical thigh corner.

And this may seem like a minor dig, but this is a little black dress. There are so few elements here to screw up - and the flip side of that coin is that when you DO screw one up, there's no hiding it. As designed, this dress is unwearable on me, and it's not due to bad fit or it just not looking good on my body - this is purely poor product design that could have been solved simply by removing the zipper. I hope that the designer sees this and takes note, because I really, really want to love this dress, and I'm really, really mad that I can't. In the meantime, I'll be making an attempt to remove the zipper myself so I can actually wear this.

See photos, I wish I was making this up.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my review.
summary: Update: received the updated, zipperless design in navy and love it. Would still be wary of this in black - read on for details.

I love this beach cover up! Living in Florida we go to the beach or the pool several times a week so I am always looking for cute cover ups. The main thing I really like about this one is that it doubles as a little jumper or mini dress as well. Many beach cover ups are completely see through so they pretty much can only be worn at the beach or pool. Since this one isn't it can be worn over my suit with a cute pair of sandals, and I can feel comfortable wearing it into a store or restaurant when we are done swimming. The cover up is very well made out of 100% polyester. It is a soft and very comfortable material. The stitching is done well, and I have noticed no loose threads in the seams. I have washed it several times in warm water and tumble dried it on low, and it has not shrunk or faded at all. The design is really cute in my opinion. It is a one size fits all which normally makes me a little nervous as I am pretty tiny. I am 5'5 and about 105 pounds. I normally wear a size X-Small or Small. This fits me perfectly, yet because of the drawstring waist there is plenty of room to loosen it up to fit other sizes as well. There is a deep V in the back with a decorative string that goes across the back and hangs down. It has brass or copper looking decorative engraved beads on it, which are also on the ends of the ties at the waist. The front has a smaller V. I tried wearing it the intended way at first with the deeper V in the back, but my problem was that the string with the beads that hangs down would always flip up every time I would bend over and hit me in the neck. It got to be very annoying. So I figured out that if I turned it around, and flipped the string over my head so it was still in the back it was much more comfortable, and I actually like the way it looks better. (I demonstrate wearing it both ways in my video.) I sometimes wear it off the shoulder, and sometimes wear it on the shoulders. It looks cute either way. I love this cover up and would definitely recommend it. I will probably be buying more in other colors. *I received this cover up at a discounted price for testing purposes, and for an honest and unbiased review. The opinions in this review are 100% my own based on my experience with the product, and I made no commitment to leave a positive review.*

I love nautical themed designs, being that I live near the ocean this backpack is a must have!
What I really love about the design is the vibrant colors and the size of the anchors. The backpack itself is of durable quality, it says polyester but feels more like a nylon material. I like the fact that it is easy to clean too.
The overall sz. is large at 17" high, it can fit my sweatshirt, and all four of my kids sweatshirts, and still have room for my keys, cell, and money in the front pocket. I mainly purchased this backpack to use when we go boating. I've placed a laptop, my kids kindles, games, and more in this pack with no problems. I've had no issues zipping or unzipping, either pockets.
The only thing that I didn't care for was the removable phone pouch, which is a velcro piece that attaches to the handles of the backpack. The phone case is way too small for my I phone 5. It could possibly fit a smaller phone, but I didn't try. Overall a great design, and I'm happy with my purchase. I received this item at a promotional price, in exchange for my honest opinion.
summary: Vibrant colors, design, and is a good quality large backpack.

To be honest though, if I had come across them before, I would have tried them anyway with the Prime free returns policy and the super low price. So, the order arrived in two days and were packaged in a clothing bag within a mail bag with specific return instructions included. The first thing you'll notice is how soft / silky they feel, yet they're not thick and suffocating. I have true fleece pants that are so dense that I sweat in them even in cold weather. These breathe and are really comfortable. So, why only 4 stars? Well, they are OSFA, which means that they are stretchy and should fit the average sized person. I am 5'2" and weigh 125, so small average. I expected them to be long and a bit loose. Yes and yes, so no biggie, but when I did the bend over test, they were a bit thin. No downward dog in these - unless you're going for that kind of attention. No judgement here. So then, why 4 stars? Well, they're leggings. Most, unless they're made for working out, are going to show your stuff if bent all the way over. That's why they're often paired with a tunic. They're SO inexpensive and if you decide that they're too thin in the back to comfortably wear in public, return them. Or better yet, keep them for PJ's.

I wouldn't recommend them for wearing in early fall (too warm), but as the temps drop, they're perfect.

reviewText: I like it.

Free product provided for evaluation and review.

Wow, this is a big wolf's tooth.  It definitely feels real, another form a distance it looks like it might not be because of the sheer size of it.  Mine is very curved, but it is 3.25" long!  It almost seems too long but I suppose it is the entire tooth because only the bottom half is very ridged, the top half is more smooth..  It's on a very adjustable necklace with natural beads of wood and bone holding it in place.
The necklace has 2 knots that slide to adjust the length, so it should fit about anyone where they want it.  It weighs 17 grams and most of that weight is in the tooth.

Downside- it has a metal O ring holding the tooth onto the necklace that could be a weakness if the tooth gets pulled or caught in clothing, because that ring is not that hard and bends a bit too easily.  It could easily be replaced with a very thin strip of leather or cord, as the hole in the tooth would be big enough to thread something through.
summary: My tooth is 3.25 inches long, the necklace looks cool, and I love the natural cord that is easily adjustable

reviewText: freaking awesome! Get comps all the time...

I ordered the Medium, and found it almost right, but a tad too large. So, I returned it for a Small and found an excellent fit - BUT

The difference in the two coats was palpable, and confusing. The M coat was a heavier material and has a stouter lining. The S coat is... not what I would describe as a viable winter coat.

After a bit of head-scratching, I found a new disclaimer on the page saying that the coats are no longer 100% wool for 2017. (partly what attracted me to the coat) Ergo, the Medium coat must be 2016 and 100% wool, and the Small coat a 2017 and only 80% wool.

As a result, I am having to return both coats. Some advice to the seller: don't sell something labeled as a "winter" coat if it isn't made for winter.

Seller's new disclaimer, literally two days later: "UPDATE 2017--We reduce the wool content from 100% to 80% in order to the good wearer effect. For the pure wool coat is too soft to lose the sense of the three-dimensional ,this year's reasonable version type will makes you look more charming in winter."

reviewText: Great quality! Both my boys have a pair.

This belt is odd because it's a mix of heavy duty and cheap parts.  As a whole I am disappointed in this belt.  The center part of the buckle was attached so poorly that fluff was poking out on both sides, like someone just slit a hole in it and shoved the part through.  This doesn't give me confidence that the product will stand the test of time.  If I had seen it in a store, I would have put it back on the shelf after noticing this.  This belt is small! I made sure to measure my waist before ordering, but the holes stopped way too far from the end for me to wear it properly.  So it's pretty much useless to me.  It's a bummer as I was really hoping it'd work for me, because I LOVE the color (Lake Blue) and the fact that this is a fabric woven belt.  The fabric is even flexible and soft at that, which is good because I have sensitive skin.  Also, the buckle itself is heavy duty, sturdy, looks nice, and it's smooth to the touch.  But, the belt buckle isn't even in the same color family as the belt loop, which makes this belt look cheap.  The loop is dark brown faux leather, while the buckle has a brushed nickel look.  So it doesn't look like the picture.  This is annoying because generally when you buy a colorful belt, it's because you want to show it off.

Disclaimer: I was compensated for a portion of the purchase price in exchange for my honest opinions about this product.  I am in no way associated with this company or with Amazon.
summary: SMALL.  Beautiful color, but poorly assembled.

reviewText: Meh. It does the job, but the quality is lacking.

I received this kit in return for an honest review.  I have to say that I have not found anything to complain about.  The kit has everything you could possibly need and then some.  We have used it when we went four-wheeling and rock climbing.

Disclaimer:  I was provided this product in return for an impartial review. My views may not reflect the views of the company as I will not hold back if I see something wrong with the product.

Review:
Video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/oeh3f7vFQ9U

I received the accessory kit in very good time and it was packed well.  It came in a sealed large plastic bag that I had to cut open to get the product out.  There were moisture absorbers in the bag, though maybe not enough as you'll see below.

The first thing I noticed was the quality of the plastic.  The quality appeared to be slightly superior to other kits I have purchased if not better in some ways.  There were no issues with plastic being molded wrong nor were there any "dud" parts that couldn't be used. The parts fits together well and everything worked without issue. There were some unusual things about the kit that I will detail below in the Pros and Cons but the most notable are the extra thumb screws and bolts, and the long bolts on the pipe clamp allowing attachment to large items.

I have used the parts from this kit while kayaking the San Saba River here in the Texas Hill Country and I was fairly impressed.  I mounted one of the mounts on my Kayak using the two sided sticky pad and it held very securely without any issue even though the surface had a very slight texture.  It stuck well enough to where I felt that I couldn't easily take it off. The head mount strap was very secure and felt good on the head. The camera felt very secure.

There were almost no issues with this kit. The only issues I found were that the bag, though large enough to hold all of the plastic pieces, was not large enough to hold all of the harnesses and the plastic mounts, plus camera float. It is apparently designed with the idea that you'll only have with you the things that you need to carry. This is generally true so not that big of a deal and I still found it very valuable on our last couple of outings.

The only other thing I found wrong was that the screw/bolts on the pipe clamp were mildly rusty. It would seem that even though there were moisture absorbers in the bag, it wasn't quite enough. It is likely that this happened in the warehouse or during shipping overseas.  Maybe a couple more moisture absorbers would help stop this.  A little oil on the bolts should stop any additional rust though it should be re-applied after using in water environments.  You'll see in the video that it did not affect the use at all and is truly a minor issue overall.

Pros:
- Excellent materials. No molding issues.
- Includes items not found in other kits:
  - Long screws on the pipe clamp. This is nice to attach it to larger items.
- Accessory bag is large enough to hold all the small plastic pieces.
- Wrench is included for easier tightening of thumb screws.
- Many extra thumb screws/bolts included with spare nuts with them.

Cons:
- While big enough for most purposes, bag could have been a bit bigger.
- Bolts on pipe bracket were slightly rusty requiring a little bit of oil to stop the rust.

I actually had to look to find anything wrong. Overall the product was very good and had features I hadn't seen in other kits. I will be using these accessories for a long time to come.
summary: Excellent Accessory Kit with everything you need for your next adventure!

**I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.**

We love it!  My baby girl is 4 months, weights about 14 pounds, and it is slightly big for her now but I'm sure she'll grow into them in a few months.  I tried it on her and even though it is big now but it doesn't slip out because I can tie the knot tighter.  The shoes look much much cuter in person, color and style are same as listing description.  There's no hard edges anywhere and the sole is fairly soft, should be pretty comfortable.  The material is suede-like, good looking and non slippery on our hardwood floor so that's nice.

They are so pretty!  My daughter is only 3 month old now so she's not fitting in them yet, very loose now but I'm expecting that she'll fit in them better probably by the end of this year.  I don't want it too tight since we will be wearing socks with them.

The bottom sole is very soft, has a light padding.  The material of the top part probably is a synthetic material, not the best material but acceptable.  I've been bending and twisting it, passed my test, no tear.  :)  The color is very similar to the listing picture.  The style is identical.  Great for babies and toddlers.  I can't wait still my baby fits in them, would go really well with either a skirt or leggings.  Also, I thoroughly checked, there are no hard or sharp edges on the shoes, always need to make sure this since it is for baby.

Would recommend!

The shorts piece does not have much of a pouch, so if you're more well endowed you will find things hanging to the side and visible. The top also has an elastic band at the wait and arms. reviewText: Too small.

This item arrived as pitured and in brand new condition.

When I opened the box it arrived in I was pleasently suprised to find that the item arrived in retail packaging. I came in a plastic box, pictured below, with a photo of the item on the front. I was a very nice presentation compared to some of the other clothing items I have ordered, which just arrive in plastic bags.

The material was as expected for the price, a pleather/fabric mixute. It looks very nice and exactly as pictured, which was great. The gloves that came with were the pleather material also and were sturdy, they fit snug and the material holds up well.

Getting it all on and buckled did take some time, I'd suggest having a partner help if one is available. The first thing I noticed was the pouch, it's very small and covers, not holds as you would expect. The waist fit wel but snugl, I have a 33" waist and had to have the buckles in the last holes. The chest straps also fit slightly snug and were all on the last buckles. I'm 5'11" and it worked well for my height and chest width.

Overall I would recomend this for smaller built men, my height or shorter with a waist size between 28 to 33 inches.

My husband has been talking about getting more of a weekend/dress watch. He wanted something a little flashy but still was durable for his outdoor adventures. I saw this watch and loved the appearance and practicality.
My package arrived on time and in a yellow envelope. The watch was packaged to prevent damage but is very disappointing as a gift. At this price point I expected for it at least to come in a box. It came in a cheesy plastic bag that really made it feel cheaper than it is. Once I got it out of the bag I found it had an extra layer of visquin to protect the finish which left the watch in perfect condition. It also came with easy to use instructions.
The design looks much better than I expected it is a beautiful soft black with not too much shine. The red accents combined with the black give a very modern appearance that allows him to wear it in a more casual or formal setting. The material felt to be a nice medium to high quality stainless steel, I love the clasp and it seems very durable. He said it is very comfortable on and the links did not tug on his hair or skin at all.
A unique feature is that it has both digital and an analog clock on it, I like the analog gives a higher end appearance but my husband prefers military time so she has both. The watch itself is not suitable for swimming but is as they call it living waterproof. That is a huge must with my husband as he is always into something.
Overall he is very pleased with his gift and it feels like it will hold up for a long time. I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I frequently purchase from Amazon and am influenced by reviews when I purchase items so I always give honest reviews. I hope this review was helpful If so please click yes below
summary: Beautiful watch, only 4 stars dur to packaging but the watch is a five star product

reviewText: It was for a gift, but design is really nice for those who like big, robust watches.
summary: but design is really nice for those who like big

reviewText: Every time my husband and I go shopping for something besides groceries he always checks out the watches. He loves them and they are the only accessory he wears. I told him to pick out a watch, my treat, and he chose this one. We have a big difference in taste but I have to agree this watch is sharp looking. When we recieved it in the mail it was so much better than I expected. The face of the watch is a lot bigger than appears in a picture but a feature I feel is in trend right now. This watch is both digital and analog. The band is a 2 centimeter black stainless steel and has a double butterfly buckle closure. My husband had to take out a few links in order for the watch to fit properly. There are more links than you would ever need but more is better than not enough. With there being extra he is able to replace a link if need be. The red accents of this watch compliment the black well. This watch is multi functional and there are four silver function buttons along with a black turn dial to set the analog time. It displays time digitally and analog. Other digital functions include an LED backlight, a stop watch, alarm with snooze function and display of the month/day and day of the week. It comes with an instruction booklet but took us a little bit to decipher how to use. The back of the watch has engraving by each button telling you what the function is. It is stamped on the back 30 m water resistant and professional waterproof. I'm not exactly sure as to what that means and the Amazon lisitng for this watch states it is not waterproof. My guess is if someone happened to pour water on you it wouldn't break down but that doesn't mean it's safe to take for a swim. This is just such a stunning piece that my husband is certainly giddy to have it part of his collection. It is heavy duty, appears veery durable and has been keeping time. I think it is listed at a very low price that is suitable for most budgets and is currently on sale for $23.99. I have seen watches of this caliber listed up to $100. This would make a wonderful gift for any man and for any occasion whether it be a Birthday, Graduation, Anniversary or even Father's Day. This watch would also appeal to many age groups I recieved this product at a discount for the purpose of my review. All opinions are honest and 100% my own.
summary: This watch looks expensive and sharp but price is within budget!!!!!!
